335b7(mdo bskal bzang): po'i gzims khri cig phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu nr-i sems bskyed// bde gshegs phreng thogs khyim bdag bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong gzi brjid la/ ka ka ni ya'i gdugs
335b8(mdo bskal bzang): spos gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdeg shegs yon tan 'od ni gser tog so// de bzhin gshegs pa rmugs pa med de la// me mang gcigacig phul ba byas nas kyang / 
336a1(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'od gzigs 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mdzod la/ khang pa brtsegs pa stong snyed
336a2(mdo bskal bzang): dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mar me spos 'bru mar 'tshong bur gyur ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rol par snang ba gang // bye ba drug bcu'i 'khor bcas dgal
336a3(mdo bskal bzang): khrus khang phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mthu ldan gos 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgyas de la// ras chos lib leb pa dag phul nas kyang // dang
336a4(mdo bskal bzang): pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs sman pa sman/ pa'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan bral de la spos kyi ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu
336a5(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nges pa 'bru ma ri mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'joms mdzad la// mar me khang cig phul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
336a6(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs mdzod spu phreng rgyud mkhan bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la// ud pal dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde
336a7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs portan ldan stobs kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub de la ni// rin po che las byas pa'i gdan khri grangs brgyad bcu// rtsa bzhi phul nas dang po byang chub tu na
336a8(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs lha dpal rgya mtsho'i tshong bar gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gza'i brjid phung po 'ang de la// nor bu rin chen zla dpag tshad gcig snang ba// rdul nas dang po byung
336b1(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gtul dka' shing 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par gshegs de la// tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
336b2(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal mtshan chu'i// sbyin bdag gyur tshe bde gshegs pa yid 'ong grags// de ltar chu snod dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde
336b3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs tshogs can khrus par gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rab dang ba la// khrus kyi tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs
336b4(mdo bskal bzang): phyugs rdzir gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan dang por mngon rdzogs par// sangs rgyas gyur pa'i tshe na de la bye bre gang // phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde ba
336b5(mdo bskal bzang): tshig brtan 'gron bu 'tshong ba'i bur gyur tshe// bde gshe gas mi g.yor gshegs pa la/ 'gron du slar gang gtor te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mi 'gyid
336b6(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal bu bdag 'dod tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas la/ glu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'od mdzad 'khor los bsgyur
336b7(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid brtsegs 'od la// na gza' rin po che dag phul nas kyang // deng byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rin po che yis// de bzhin gshegs pa zla
336b8(mdo bskal bzang): gnas de la ni/ me tog mya ngan tshang ba bdun phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rdo rje lha dbang brgya byon du/ gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa la// me tog man d+ha ra'i char pa/ 
337a1(mdo bskal bzang): nu nusas byed/ 'dagashegs ni snyen 'i mam ma gyu // de bzhin gshegs pa na 'jigs kyin la/ rim ma'i babar bas chen ngasan kyong/ nga nga tani sems stong/ 
337a2(mdo bskal bzang): zing gshegs rin chen rlomachog gyur ba'i chi/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsa'i mdzod de la/ sgras kyis sbas pa'i bre ba phul nas kyang / dang ba byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs par spyan 'grus
337a3(mdo bskal bzang): 'a ma khan 'argya 'o// de bzhin gnakun du gadzagasang sa// khri 'u mangs ca gang dus dbyas nas kyang / dang byang chu tuni sems bskyed/ bde ga shegs dngas pa rgyam ze na
337a4(mdo bskal bzang): pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhon pa tshe ldan pa/ skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs me tog 'od zer gser mgar gyi/ bur gyur chen
337a5(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs kun gzigs la// rin chen che'i phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shes dges byis pa brgyan bde tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yul phyogs
337a6(mdo bskal bzang): kun mchod la// mig dang bdug pa dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa bla ma la// bde gshegs gzi chen tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin
337a7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa 'od rab gsal de la/ na gza'i bla re dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshangs pa bag chos mkhan 'gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa bla ma la/ 
337b1(mdo bskal bzang): ga'ar ril bu byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// de gshegs 'od dadag med pa du ma'i ci// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa 'ad la/ gdugs gcig cig ni dngul ba byas nas kyang / 
337b2(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs bkru byin byeng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam sbyangs la// me tog chun po phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde ga shegs
337b3(mdo bskal bzang): brtan gshegs nor bu mkhan 'gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis slong de la// rin po che'i dra ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan mthong ba gsos spyan
337b4(mdo bskal bzang): la/ sbyor sman mkhas bur gyur chen dge slong dge/ 'dun dag/ spyan drangs nang sman sbyar nas bde gshegs legs mthong la/ dang po kho nar byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs brtson
337b5(mdo bskal bzang): 'grus sbyin pa 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal tshe// tsan dan dmar po dag las gtsug lag khang brgya stong // byas te ras bcos g.yogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa po// bdud rtsi'i stobs la dang po byang chub tu ni
337b6(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs bzang skyong gis ni bde gshegs zla ba'i 'od// nyan thos bcas pa'i dge 'dun khri khrag bcu// zhag bdun par du zhal zas ro ni brgyad ldan pas// tshim par mdzad de byang chub
337b7(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dga' bo sal chen bram ze'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod grags la// yu ba nor bus spras pa'i rnga yab cig/ phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
337b8(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa mchi med rgyal po yi// pho nyar gyur tshe bde gshegs dpal sbas la/ pa na tsa ka'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshan zhing pa'i ni/ 
338a1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa rogs pa de sa/ skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rgyal ba tshal gyi las byed tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med/ 
338a2(mdo bskal bzang): 'khor mo la/ a ru ra'i 'bras bu dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni se mos bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa chos ldan dpa' ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i nga ro la/ rgyal mtshan dag ni
338a3(mdo bskal bzang): dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs mchog rgyal po spros 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mchod rten la// phye ma sbar gang dul te gtor nas
338a4(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde ga tse kha l-i bsgyur ba'i byis pa'i byas pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid la/ ba la pa tA gsum zhig phul nas kyang // 
338a5(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dag gshe gas rgyal ba'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la// dngul gi me tog dag ni phul nas kyang / 
338a6(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha'i tshong dpon pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dpag med la/ lhum gzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul bas kyang / dang
338a7(mdo bskal bzang): pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan lag ni rtse ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la ni/ 'phyags khru brgyad 'khor yug bkram nas kyang // dang po byang chub
338a8(mdo bskal bzang): tu nI sems bskyed// bdo gshegs smras glang spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa rnam grol gyi// 'chags spos kyi chus chag chag btab// dang po byang chub tu ni semos bskyen/ 
338b1(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs rnam gzigs gos 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa sgrib med la// me tog gi ni gdugs dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
338b2(mdo bskal bzang): 'brug sgra rdza mkhan gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs de la// spos dang ril ba gcig cig dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs legs sems khye'u la
338b3(mdo bskal bzang): gsum lon pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs pa la/ pad ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yid bzangs tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// 
338b4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal byin de la ni// sna ma'i me// tog dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bde gshegs dri med zag par gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin
338b5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs mthong de la ni// 'ba' sha ko gcig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs zla ba glang chen 'dul ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang
338b6(mdo bskal bzang): de la ni/ me tog phreng ba khru gang phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sesas bskyed// bde gshegs grags chen grong khyer brten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros grags de la// me tog gi phul ba byas
338b7(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gtsug na nor bu khye'u yi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod de la/ sa rdul sbar gang dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po
338b8(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul lta bu'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sba ba'i 'od de la// lha'i zhal med khang cig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
339a1(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs seng stabs gdugs mkhan gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thar par zhud de la// tsha ba'i dus tshe lo ma'i gdugs dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub
339a2(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bkod de la// lam gyi zhing drung dag tu be'u ras ni phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems
339a3(mdo bskal bzang): bskye// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam rgyal ba lang rje'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo de la/ ldum bzed 'o mas kang ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde
339a4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs shes rab rtsegs pa dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de la// nyin cig rangs par chos kyi gdan phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
339a5(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs legs gnas lham mkhan gyur pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba yi tshe// mchi lham rim pa gcig pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de ban
339a6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa blo gros las byed tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i blo gros la/ ro dang ldan pa'i btung ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yan lag skyes ni mi 'dzin
339a7(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang de la ni/ khrus ras ngag gi dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas pa ni/ lom ston gyur
339a8(mdo bskal bzang): bude gshegs bden smra 'i/ shing drung gnas lam dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang nub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhon gshegs pa gzugs bzang sde dpon mo// de bzhin gshegs pa skar
339b1(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal dbyangs de la// me tog ud pal lnga dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen ldan dgon gnas dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong de'i
339b2(mdo bskal bzang): 'chags byi dor dag ni byas nas kyang // dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs 'od zer shing rta mkhan gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas la// nyal khri stong ri ba dag phul nas kyang / 
339b3(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rtul zhugs brtan pa ni/ dreng rgyud mkhan tshe bde gshegs yid 'ong sems// de la me tog bla re phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ 
339b4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shiso shing thun tshe// de bzhin gash+ye ba grags pa'i shing rta la// bu yug langs tshe snang me ltam nas kyang // dang / po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs bden
339b5(mdo bskal bzang): rtog khrus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan me tog la/ kha gdong bkru ba dbul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed/ bde gshegs pad ma bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa me
339b6(mdo bskal bzang): tog 'od zer la/ pad ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu ni spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gtul bar dka' zhes bya
339b7(mdo bskal bzang): de'i/ khang pa brtsegs pa tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa lag zangs rgyal po'i pho nya'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs
339b8(mdo bskal bzang): bsnan sgrogs par mdzad pa gang / 'khor bcas bye ba dag la chos gos phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas ni/ tshan po cher gyur g.yul
340a1(mdo bskal bzang): ngor chas pa'i tshe// bde gshegs legs mthong la ni rgyal mtshan gcig phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro sman pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa
340a2(mdo bskal bzang): skye ba'i mchod rten la// spos kyi ril bu dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs byin lam ston tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen zhes bya la// de la lam dang mtshon
340a3(mdo bskal bzang): po byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas mnyan pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rdzi ba med gshegs la// nyan thos 'khor bcas bye ba bsgral nas kyang / dang pa
340a4(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs lha'i mi tog nor bu mkhan 'gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal la// nor bu rin spras pa'i gdugs phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
340a5(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs don leg so sems pa rgyal ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung bstan de la ni/ nor bu rin chen smras pa'i bla re phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug
340a6(mdo bskal bzang): shing mkhan gyi// bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs skar 'od kyi// gshegs zam dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs blo grags kun dga' ra bsrung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
340a7(mdo bskal bzang): zla ba'i sgron de la// mon sran gre'u'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs spros brtsegs tshong ba'i bu gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog de// sbyin pa phun sum tshogs
340a8(mdo bskal bzang): spyan grangs nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi// tshal gyi las byed tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa la/ bsod nams bkod de la ni aM pra phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems
340b1(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa phan bzhin grong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od ces pa lnga// nyin cig srog gcod spong ba'i bslab bzhi mnos nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
340b2(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs rnam grol grong brdal byis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas la// lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye // de bzhin gshegs pa
340b3(mdo bskal bzang): mun dang bral ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' gzigs pa la/ sran gre'u 'bru mar mar gzhag phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs sgra gcan lha ni gong rten tshe// 
340b4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bar gzigs de/ la// hra sta bar sha ka dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed bde gshegs ri'i rgyal mtshan tshogs ldan gyi/ khye'ur gyur tshe bde
340b5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs mtha' yas 'od/ de la me tog chun bo phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bsgyid// bde gshegs tshe gas can 'od ni phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong dbyangs
340b6(mdo bskal bzang): de la/ me tog las byas bla re phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen snying po khrus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung ba la/ kha gdong bkru ba dbul ba
340b7(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shin du 'thor gshegs grong khyer brten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims stabs de grong khyer du/ gshegs pa'i tshe na gdan
340b8(mdo bskal bzang): dag bshams te ting nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs skar rgyal da nur mkhan gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha de la// zhal zas bca' ba rnaMs ni phul nas
341a1(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ru rings gzhan gyis 'khol gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dga' de la// ldum bzed 'jams kyis bkang ste
341a2(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan grags pa bsod snyoms tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas la/ gos kyi ras ma sor bzhi tsam phul nas/ dang po
341a3(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla ba de gshegs srid sbyin tshe// 'khor bcas bye ba sum stong dag la gtsug lag khang // bzang por longs spyad phyir dang dpag tshad bcu pa'i gos// 
341a4(mdo bskal bzang): gting ba phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nyi 'od gzhan gyis khol gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po che de la// ljags kyi snod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang
341a5(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gsheg sa skor mkhan tshong pa'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs gsal de la ni// nor du rin chen dpag tshad gcig 'od ldan// phul nas dang po
341a6(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa seng tog ded dpon gyi// bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po// blo gros bzang la phreng ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gabye
341a7(mdo bskal bzang): ba dus mkhyen rgyal po ni// stan ngags mkhan tshe bde gshegs tsam mchog la// tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying
341a8(mdo bskal bzang): po yis/ gzhan gyi dge 'dun bshos yid rang nas// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs srid mthor gzigs pa tshal dag gi/ las byed tshe na
341b1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa po// khyad par sems la chab rtsang phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs blo 'od rngon pa bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i sems de la// 
341b2(mdo bskal bzang): rtswa'i stan dag phul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng gis byin pa khyim bdag gi/ bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs par snying la/ sngar ma'i me tog yod pa'i sa gzhi
341b3(mdo bskal bzang): dul// dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan gyis/ 'jigs bcas lam du 'gron po'i gsel byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med bu de lan
341b4(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde ga tse mchog dga' grags pa bu ram shing // 'chir 'gyur tshe na de ba/ zhin gshegs pa po// blo rjes 'byed pa bu ram bcud khu blud// dang po byang chub
341b5(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs brtson 'gru sa gtan pa bram ze'i bu gyur tshe// bde gshegs 'od zer mtha' yas la// khrus rkyen dag pa'i chab dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
341b6(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs grags rdzogs chang 'tshong bu gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la// lo ma'i snod las chu dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
341b7(mdo bskal bzang): bsnyengs bra'i rgyal po'i bur gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po ring rol// lo ma'i snod nas bar sha'i me tog dul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdo gshegs mtshad chos lnga ni blon mchog
341b8(mdo bskal bzang): gyur pa'i tshe/ bde bshegs yid 'ong blo 'od dag la dpag tshad cig/ khor ra yug tsam gyi bskyed mos tshal phupu la a ka ru'o// 'dug pa gtugs te dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs sngan
343a1(mdo bskal bzang): chen mi kren gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od de// rtswa'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'jig rten 'od ni
343a2(mdo bskal bzang): lha'i bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la// me tog man d+ha ra ba'i gdugs phul nas su// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs spos dri zhim pa kyang gyur tshe// de bzhin gash+ye
343a3(mdo bskal bzang): pa yan lag mdzes de la// khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan mchog 'dzin sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med
343a4(mdo bskal bzang): don la/ bdag pa dang ni dar yug phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mun dang rnam gral rgyal ba yi// 'dun 'don bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs
343a5(mdo bskal bzang): pa ni/ bgra bcom gzi la mu tig brgyan phreng dag/ phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'gram pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la/ 
343a6(mdo bskal bzang): 'dam rdzab dag tu shing zam btsugs phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen grags pa spros 'tshong gi/ bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs dbyangs mnga' la/ phye ma slar gang
343a7(mdo bskal bzang): dag ni gtor phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs skyon rab zhi ba rgyal ba'i tshe // gsang bya tshe na btson dag 'brosu gtang nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa sa mchog de la ni// ngang
343a8(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'chang ba grong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs 'od 'bar de la ni/ bye dUr+ya'i gdugs phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
343b1(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs mi zla phreng rgyud mkhan bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nges par sems de la/ ud pa la'i phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa
343b2(mdo bskal bzang): shin du gzigs pa ni/ 'dun dpon chen de bzhin gshegs pa po// bden par gsung ba de la phreng ba phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bde gshegs rab po rgyun grong khyer la brten pa ye
343b3(mdo bskal bzang): bur gyur chen bde gshegs mdangs 'od kyi/ grong khyer sgo dag mdzes par byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nor 'od brgya byin gyur pa'i tshe// bde gshegs gzi brjid
343b4(mdo bskal bzang): me tog rgyas pa la// dpag tshad 'khor yug moto// char phab nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis// bde gshegs grags tog shes rab
343b5(mdo bskal bzang): pha rol phyin// gsung tshe legs gsungs zhes ni yid rang phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs don des ldan pa tha ga par/ gyur tshe bde gshegs yon tan bsal ba la/ 
343b6(mdo bskal bzang): ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdi gshegs tshe sbyin blo chen gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron de la/ bsil yangab dag ni dbul byas nas kyang / 
343b7(mdo bskal bzang): drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas gzhu mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsal rab dpal de la/ me tog snyim po bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang byang chub tu ni
343b8(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs skye dbang 'tshungs pa rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal sdug sde bdag la/ snod dag chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde ga
344a1(mdo bskal bzang): stabs gshegs zhing ba'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs bzhud la/ zam stegs dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs blo gnas
344a2(mdo bskal bzang): shing srung gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i mchod rte la/ se 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gdugs mdzes blon por bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin
344a3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i blo de la// tsam pa ka'i me tog phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo gser mgar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i snying
344a4(mdo bskal bzang): po la// bdug pas gdugs pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shin du 'phags dpal spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs
344a5(mdo bskal bzang): pa gdugs sde'i// 'chag sa spos chus chag chag btab nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng ge'i rnga mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sa lnga'i rgyal po la
344a6(mdo bskal bzang): rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rnam grol ldan po dung 'bud mkhan/ gyur tshe bde gshegs nyi ma'i snying po de// grong khyer gshegs
344a7(mdo bskal bzang): tshe dung dag bus nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// / bam po nyi shu bzhi pa// / de bzhin gshegs pa kru 'od zla ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs byang chub
344a8(mdo bskal bzang): dga' de la// rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs me dog ri bo gar mkhan bur gyur tshe// bde gshegs dbang po bzhi de la// spyan sngar bro gar
344b1(mdo bskal bzang): dag gis mchod byas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs klu dbang gar mkhan bu gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la// rol mo'i sgra dag sgrags pa byas nas kyang / 
344b2(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po yi// sras por gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po// pad dkar spos la mu tig rgyan phreng phu la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems
344b3(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bong gshegs shin tu grags pa tshong dpon gyi// chung mar gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po// lhun po'i 'od zer spyi bor bla re phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs stobs
344b4(mdo bskal bzang): lha'i grong khyer brten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la// bshos dron lhung bzed bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs
344b5(mdo bskal bzang): pa yon tan 'od ldan gyis/ de bzhin gshegs ba sbyangs ldan bzhud de la// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal thal mo lan gsum sbyar/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa klu lag
344b6(mdo bskal bzang): grong khyer gyi// sgo bsrungs tshe na phyag dar byas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs rnams lta de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mig rgyan bur gyur tshe// de bzhin ga byeH
344b7(mdo bskal bzang): chos kyi 'od de la// chu dang skyu ru ra dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshul gsal te snga dro zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par sbyangs pa'i blos// dga' bas
344b8(mdo bskal bzang): sangs rgyas rjesu dran pas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zil non ye shes kyis// ngan 'gror 'gro ba tshul khrims la bkod nas// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo de
345a1(mdo bskal bzang): la ni dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mtha' yas spyan no gos 'tshang tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la/ ras bcos bla re dag ni dul nas kyang / dang po byed
345a2(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bden bsrung khyim bdag bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus bden de la// me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni
345a3(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs nyi 'od bcas mkhan bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la// la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa des/ 
345a4(mdo bskal bzang): blo bzang mkhan de la// gding ba dag ni dbul// ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ma tha' yas gzugs ni shing rta mkhan gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
345a5(mdo bskal bzang): 'od gzhi la/ pa la she dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad gar mkhan bur gyur tshe// bde gshegs mi'i gzi brjid la// me long/ 
345a6(mdo bskal bzang): gcig gi dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen tog ni nor bu mkhan/ gyur tshe bde gshegs bsod nams ste bzangs la// nor bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang
345a7(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs the tsom spangs pa rgyal po yi// btsun mor gyur tshe bde gshegs brtson ldan pa de la// me tog bskyed mos tshal dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni

345b1(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs don yod rnam gnod mi mjed bdag/ tshangs tshe bde gshegs grags pa'i rgyal mtshan la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gtso
345b2(mdo bskal bzang): pa rtogs par mdzad pa pos// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od de la// spos kyi ril bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs me tog rgyal mtshan rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin

345b4(mdo bskal bzang): che de yi// dbu skra legs par bregs pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzu brjid chen po 'bru mar mkhan/ gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
345b5(mdo bskal bzang): mchod 'os kyi/ gtsug lag khang du spos chus bskor ba 'bru mar phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs don mdzad gzigs tal pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal
345b6(mdo bskal bzang): gyi mchog de las// lhang tsher leb leb po dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub
345b7(mdo bskal bzang): sems dpa' de la ni// 'dzam bu'i chu bo gdugs stong phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lha ni 'dzam gling gi rgyal por gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs
345b8(mdo bskal bzang): pa dag mchod la/ 'bras bu'i bskyed mos tshal dag phul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas mkhyen pa chang 'tshong tshe// bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs

346a2(mdo bskal bzang): me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mya ngan med pa dpa' bo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems dpa' de// 'jigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis
346a3(mdo bskal bzang): spyan drangs nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma bral ba yI/ so can kun la yud tsam byams bsgoms nas// de bzhin gshegs pa des 'bung blo do la// dang po byang chub tu ni
346a4(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs lha shing srung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po dbyangs de la// bu ram shing gi sdong bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed//

346a8(mdo bskal bzang): sgra bsgrags nas// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ni brtsegs pa de la yang // dpe byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs kun gzigs stobs kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba yi tshe// gtsug lag khang mchog bye ba
346b1(mdo bskal bzang): drug byed nug nas// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med par dga' de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan 'od gsal phyag dar bar/ gyur che bde gshegs yul 'khor lnga de la// rdol pa gdan dgang yul/

346b3(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen 'od ni ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas de la ni// rin po che'i sbom bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin tshan
346b4(mdo bskal bzang): ga ni ljags mgar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na dga'ade la/ lcags mkhar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang ba byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa klags bla chang 'tshong che/ 
346b5(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma'i rgyal po la// 'dzi dbu'i ro bro dag ni bul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'od byed tshong dpon bu gyur tshe// nga bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi 'od de la/ 
346b6(mdo bskal bzang): mu shi kag shi'i me tog dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi brjid dpag med phreng gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs phyogs sa rnam grags la/ pad ma 'dab brgya pa dag phul nas kyang / dang

346b8(mdo bskal bzang): seng ge'i sku ni spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog de la// spos kyi phur ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mkhas blo tshong dpon khol po tshe// de bzhin gshegs
347a1(mdo bskal bzang): pa 'jigs med sprin de la// me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal dka' lta bu'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po la/ me tog man
347a2(mdo bskal bzang): rab phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po ni/ bstsal chen lta bu'i bram ze'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba lho de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni
347a3(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zla tog spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la// khang pa brtsegs par spos byug phyir phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshes
347a4(mdo bskal bzang): pa mthu thob shing drung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa che de la// dgun shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mthu brtsal mtha' yas tshong
347a5(mdo bskal bzang): dpon bur gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs la/ se'u 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bram ze'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin
347a6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa ston par dges de la/ ud pal chag pa gang zhig phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dri mong tshong dpon gyi/ bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa grags bla la// meto/ 
347a7(mdo bskal bzang): 'bar zhing skye ba'i sa gzhi bul// dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'on kyang gzigs pa ded dpon cha// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la// mu tig dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub
347a8(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo spos 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa dmar ser 'od de la/ tsan ngan dag gi gdam khri bul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bstod// bde gshegs
347b1(mdo bskal bzang): 'byor ldan tshong dpon 'itshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar 'dud de la/ srung rkyen gsos sman dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bsod nams pa lang rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin
347b2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa blo gros sems de la// snod dag zho yis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs sgron ma tshal gyi las byed tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gsal de la ni// am 'dra'i
347b3(mdo bskal bzang): 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od 'phro ni// ro mchog bro 'tshong de bzhin gshegs pa po// skyon zhi de la mkhar ba'i dum bu phul// dang po byang chub
347b4(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs kun rgyu mo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po la/ lo ma dag gi rilu phul nas/ kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
347b5(mdo bskal bzang): legs skyes rgya mtsho rgya mtsho tshong pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs dang bral de la// na gza' stong phrag brgya ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa nor lha'i shing 'tshod
347b6(mdo bskal bzang): tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal de la ni/ rdza bam sgron ma dag ni dul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs yid gnyis spong ba gser mgar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
347b7(mdo bskal bzang): yid gnyis sel mdzad la/ gser gyi me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs 'dzin pa dpag med gser chog to// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dpal del/ 
347b8(mdo bskal bzang): gser slar gang ni gtor te phul nas kyang / dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbed sde dpon gyi// zhu che de bzhin gshegs pa gtso mchogs/ gser sas byas pa'i gdunas / 
347'a1(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa choms med lcags mgar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la// me tog ha ta ka dbul ba byas nas kyang / 
347'a2(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mig gnas grong khyer brten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la// me tog rangs pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems skyed
347'a3(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gzigs de la/ sku rags dag ni dngul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshogs nan gtso bo mgon mad bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs
347'a4(mdo bskal bzang): pa bdud zil gnon pa de la ni/ mon sran gre 'bru mar mar me phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'gro ba'i 'od zer 'khor los bsgyur ba'i tshe/ bde
347'a5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs shing rta chen pos 'khor bcas bye stong la/ rgyal po zhal zas dag ni brim pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa phal chen 'khor los
347'a6(mdo bskal bzang): bsgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs kyis gshegs de la// dpag tshad bcu gnyis khyon tsam bskyed mos tshal phul nas// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
347'a7(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal ni 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer tshim de la/ zhabs sgrub dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid
347'a8(mdo bskal bzang): mtha' yas khrus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbed de la/ 'dag pa'i tshal gyis snod dag bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs don gyi
347'b1(mdo bskal bzang): blo gros nang pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub mthu brtsal la/ kha ra'i dum bu dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po che 'tshong tshe// 
347'b2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la// phye'i bsod nams dge ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bong gshegs tha ma smras pa sman pa'i tshe// dge 'dun dag la mar khu phul nas
347'b3(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa'i phung po la// dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bdi gshegs rims med shing rta mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam blo de la ni// shing rta dag ni dbul byas
347'b4(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin// gshegs pa legs byin bram ze'i bu gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can mya ngan 'das pa na// mar me'i phreng ba mngar ba stong
347'b5(mdo bskal bzang): steng dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags byin grong khyer mchod rten la/ brten pa'i chan de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu gsal/ grong khyer dag tu gshegs
347'b6(mdo bskal bzang): mig gti nas kyang // ra nga chub tu na sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi tig sbyin pa ni/ nor bu mkhan cing bzhin gshegs pa po// yan tan 'di la nor du bu ru/ rang po
347'b7(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed // bdag shegs skyes dus byin pa thabs ma khan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i sgron de la// ras kyi kha char dgu ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bani
347'b8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa rdo rje sngon phreng chud kyi// bu mor gyur tshe 'byor ldan 'ad zer la/ me tog mya ngan 'tshang dag dadul pa byas nas kyang / dang po nyid du byang chub sems bskyod/ bang gshegs pas chen gyi
348a1(mdo bskal bzang): gar mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ston par dges de la// tshig su bcad pa gcig gis bstod nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde bshegs zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po che// 
348a2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa legs par don sems la/ par sha ka'i me tog dri ldan gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa spros glang gdugs mkhan tshe// de bzhin
348a3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la// go ga dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu ni khyim bdag tshe// 'brog dgon dag tu dge
348a4(mdo bskal bzang): slong dge 'dun btung chu phul// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan de la ni// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa dman las byed bu'i tshe// bslab/ 
348a5(mdo bskal bzang): pa'i gzhi lnga dag la bzung ba byas nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyes par gnas pa de la no// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed// bde gshegs mi tshugs nad pa mgon med bor ba'i/ 
348a6(mdo bskal bzang): tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu' rtsal chen po de'i lam/ lag mthil tsam zhig phyag dar byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mgo'u ta ma'i tshe// de bzhin
348a7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa mkhas mchog par spyan la/ g.yar gnas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa klog tog rgya mtsho'i tshong ba'i tshe// khru brgyad/ 
348a8(mdo bskal bzang): kyis bskor spug las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer de la no// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa las byed tshe// de bzhin
348b1(mdo bskal bzang): pa gsal ba mtha' yas tshe// las gtang byas pas rnyed pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas shing srung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzus
348b2(mdo bskal bzang): de la// am 'bra dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes nyi ma rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gdugs de la/ lhung bzed dag ni kun d+he duH/ 
348b3(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa don grung smon pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer la// spos kyi reng bu dag ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
348b4(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun brtseg/ khral mi'i tshe/ bde gshegs yul 'khor kha lo bsgyur de la/ lhags parda dus su shing bur gcig phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni/ 
348b5(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyod// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'dul yang ba yi// dpyad mkhan che na bde gshegs legs mdzong dag/ 'brog dgon bzhugs tshe lhang nger gtugs phul nas/ dang po byang chub
348b6(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma phreng gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen bzhed de la// pad ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin/ 
348b7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa ni// nor mkhan tshe'i bde gshegs bskal bzhed la// nor bu rin chen me shel gcig phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes 'gros
348b8(mdo bskal bzang): ni klu rgyal rgyal tshe// bde gshegs nyi zhal sos ka'i dus dag tu/ lam du zhugs tshe char pa phab nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs bral gar mkhan tshe// 
349a1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med spyan de la/ me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang / dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'dam bu dngul po'i bur gyur che/ dgon par bde gshes
349a2(mdo bskal bzang): seng ge'i stobs de la// bshos bron dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs spos bzangs bram ze'i bur gyur che// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma che de la// lo ma dag
349a3(mdo bskal bzang): las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yul 'khor rongs ni shing bsrungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs zhon par mdzad de la/ gsal yab dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / 
349a4(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gsheg/ lha grags grong khyer brten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal de/ la// gos ras na gza' dag ni dbul nas kyang // dang po byang
349a5(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs srid mthA gzigs pa lam ston tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams snying po yi// lam srong dag ni mtshon par byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni seMs
349a6(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs zla ba spos 'tshang tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos de 'chag pa'i tshe// dus kyi rjes 'grang spos ni zhi cig phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra can
349a7(mdo bskal bzang): las mi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lta dga' de la ni/ phyag gar gcig ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen zla ba rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
349a8(mdo bskal bzang): bsnyengs med dges de la/ nyal pa ta dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni semos bskyed/ bde gshegs seng gi rgyal mtshan rdzo mkhan mo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rgyal mtshan la/ sum nyam
349b1(mdo bskal bzang): me tog lhung bzed bkang ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs bsam gtan dges pa grong khyer gyi// pho nya chen bde gshegs mdangs 'od la// medog chun po dag ni dul nas kyang // 
349b2(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs ldan rngon pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bzlas byin de la ni// mig mi 'tshums par blta ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
349b3(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grol rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbyig de la// dpag tshad khor yug me tog bcal bkram phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan rin chen
349b4(mdo bskal bzang): ldanas gtso'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la// me tog tsam pa kang ga phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dgra bcom grags pa mnyen pa'i
349b5(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa des pa po de ni/ gru dag las ni bsgral ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshe gus pa pad dngos 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
349b6(mdo bskal bzang): grags pa'i tog de la// dri zhim zhabs bkru ba dag phul nas kyang // dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed // bde gshegs mdzod spu ldan pa tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med nga rol// smyung
349b7(mdo bskal bzang): bzed zho yis bkang ste dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs spos grogs tshong pa'i khol po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan yon tan la/ lan cha srang 'ga' zhin na
349b8(mdo bskal bzang): dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu yi/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i tog de la// tshon sdong chang pa gang zhig bas snyoms thum/ 
350a1(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs che dpag med ni sman pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sred med du de la/ mig sman re'u dag ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
350a2(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs nor bu bkod pa khye'u yi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gsal ba yi// lam srang dag tu me tog dkar po phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang
350a3(mdo bskal bzang): chen rgyud kyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du dgongs de la// ko dra ba'i 'bru dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs po ye shes 'byung gnas bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
350a4(mdo bskal bzang): pa legs sems de la ni// ril ba gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gsheg sa pa lhun po grags pa yis/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dag la
350a5(mdo bskal bzang): rdzing phul nas// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcu pa lha'i bu'i tshe// bde gshegs gzi brjid mtha' yas byang/ 
350a6(mdo bskal bzang): chub snying por ni// snyoms par zhugs pa'i min sor mo lnga bsregs nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs ma smras shing rna mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge phyag de la/ so ma dan ni
350a7(mdo bskal bzang): dbul pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs glang po'i 'gros ni grong khyer na// brten pa'i chen bde gshegs blo snang la/ sham ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po/ 
350a8(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs yid 'thang gnig lus bsrung ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i tshul stsa la/ dar ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde kyi/ 
350b1(mdo bskal bzang): lam ston rin chen zlab tshe// bde gshegs rten pa'i tog ni lam dag tu/ gos kyi gdan dag bting ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba sman pa'i tshe// de banin
350b2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa legs par gnas de la/ ud pa la'i me tog bkru sman bus nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde ga shegs rab gsal rgyal po spong brtson pa'i// dge slong tshon bde gshegs dpag
350b3(mdo bskal bzang): meng ba'i/ lha la a go ta dag bul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs kha lo bsgyur ba ded dpon no// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i me tog la/ tsan dan dmar po'i khang pang/ 
350b4(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyedabade gshegs dga' bo'i dbang phyug phyug po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ mchod sbyin chen po la/ rol mo'i sgra yis mchod pa byas nas kyang // 
350b5(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gtsug na rin chen rtsi ba yi/ khye'u chen de bzhin gshegs pa tog chen la/ mtshungs pa'i bye ma gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sem skyed// 
350b6(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa snyengs grol ma 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'ong de la/ ka bid tA'i bar ma phum nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs sgra gcan lta ni zhing 'dzin/ 
350b7(mdo bskal bzang): tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od de la/ rtswa las byas pa'i mchi lha ma phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdo gshegs na chod bzang po grong bsrung tse// grong khyer dag ni sgo ni byinapa
350b8(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa rma bya'i nga ro la// dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs lha dga' sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rnam rgyal la// shi ri sha'i me tog phul nas kyang // 
351a1(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen phung po smad 'tshong ma'i// gtso bo che na bde gshegs 'byor 'od la// na ba ma la'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang
351a2(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mdzes gshegs tshong dpon bur gyur che// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ni mtha' yas la// ud pa la'i ni gcig cig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
351a3(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed do// bde gshegs seng phyogs gtso klag mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bstan par dogs de la// na gza' bkru bshal dag ni byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
351a4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa shin du mthor gshegs glang po/ yi// rdzi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bde gshegs kyi// gdan ni 'ba' ti shing drung ting nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
351a5(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs skye dbang grong khyer brten pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i lha de la// dri ka na'i me tog nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs blo gros
351a6(mdo bskal bzang): bzang po grong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gshegs de la// a 'bra'i lcug ma dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'jig rten 'od ni spos
351a7(mdo bskal bzang): 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha de la// spros rnams dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen gzi brjid bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin
351a8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa blo tshab de la ni// bal dang 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bong gshegs bskol ldan shing rtswa 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sde'i 'gros de la// 
351b1(mdo bskal bzang): me tog chun po dag ni phul nos kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs kun rgyal 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la// dar gyi lda ldi dag ni
351b2(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dka' ba dpyod pa tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po la// 'o mar bcas pa'i 'bras bu'i rnams phul kyang // 
351b3(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa skegs ni mdzad pa po// shing rta mkhan tshe bde gshegs dges chung la/ shing las byas pa'i mchil lham phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub
351b4(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs spos kyi glang po khyin/ bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsol chen po la// rma bya'i gsil ya baM dag ni phul nas su// dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed
351b5(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs blo gros 'od 'phro rgyal po yi// btsun mo'i sde na bde gshegs rgyal sde pa// me tog par shi chag pa gang phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ri bo'i
351b6(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal mtshan khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub byade lnga// lag pa 'dag pa'i chal dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa spos bzang tshong dpon tshe// de bzhi
351b7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa zla ba sdug de la// me tog chun po dag ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub ca ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs chos brtan nor bu mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la// rin po che
351b8(mdo bskal bzang): gdug sa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde bar gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul gsar mgar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gsal de la// gser gyi me tog dag ni gtor
353a1(mdo bskal bzang): gsung khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la// sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i 'bras can phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mtsho byed lha ris pa'i tshe// 
353a2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa po de yis// gtsug la khang ni phyag dar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bo gshegs na tshod bzang po rtsa 'tshong tshe// bde gshegs zil gyis mi non grags pa la/ 
353a3(mdo bskal bzang): D+ha'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed // bde gshegs pa'i legs pa'i tshogs can 'khor bsgyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od de la// na gza' rin po che dag phul nas
353a4(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs/ rnam nges blo gros tshong dpon gyi// bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sgron chen la/ mu kha tsan tra dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni seMs
353a5(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' nor bu'i spos// rim gro pa tshe bde gshegs blos dpyod pa// chos kyi gdan dag ba shams pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// 
353a6(mdo bskal bzang): bdo gshegs rgyal ba dges pa gos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal can de la// chos gos gsum dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng ge'i
353a7(mdo bskal bzang): 'od zer lam sngon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med gzigs pa po// lam tu bzhugs tshe bskor ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rna bar snang mdzad rin pa/ 
353a8(mdo bskal bzang): rtogs shes tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po// yid gnyis spong ba'i chags pa bshams nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa grogs mchog spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs/ 
353b1(mdo bskal bzang): pa rtul shugs che de la// sna ma'i me tog chun po phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs thugs rab zhungs la phyag dar ba'i// bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lha gsal la// mngon sum dag
353b2(mdo bskal bzang): tu bstod pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nor bu zla ba blta ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul med gshegs de la// lha'i zhal med khang dag phul nas kyang // dang
353b3(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs drag shul 'od zer dgon pa yi// dge slong tshe na bde gshegs yul 'khor lha// de la chos gos snam bsgyur phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
353b4(mdo bskal bzang): de gshegs rtul shu gos thub med rgyal po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par dgyes de la// gdugs dang dar yugadag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// 
353b5(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa 'gros mchod gdol bu'i tshe// nyi ma 'ga' zhig bslab pa lnga mnos nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nor bu'i tshogs ni brgya byin tshe// de bzhin
353b6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa mi 'jigs byin de la/ gser gyi shing rta rkyen bcas stong snyed bu la// dang po dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'jig rten bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' deg
353b7(mdo bskal bzang): ni// man d+hu ka'i me tog gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs glang chen seng ge yod pa yi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i 'od de'i// 'chag sa dag ni chag chag btab nas
353b8(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyal po'i bur gyur tshe// zla ba gzhin ras dge slong na pa ni// gsos sman dag la spyan drangs bde gshegs 'od 'phro la/ dang po nyid du
354a1(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs chos kyi nor bu ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po la// mu tig dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub
354a2(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs bzang byin grong khyer brten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid me tog la/ bshos dron bsod snyoms dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sem skyed/ 
354a3(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs zla ba phreng rgyud mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po la// ud pa la lnga zhig gtor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshangs dbyangs
354a4(mdo bskal bzang): lag bla byed pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul 'od de la// tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshan zla ba
354a5(mdo bskal bzang): lha rgyal po'i// pho nya byed tshe bde gshegs gzi mtha' yas// de la mchil/ lham dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dpal ni tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// 
354a6(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas la/ gser gyi phreng ba dag ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa legs skyed gser 'gar tshe// de bzhin gshes
354a7(mdo bskal bzang): pa dpal gyi snying po la// rin po che'i sdong bu phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// d+mo gshegs thub mod tshogs ni 'thun dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
354a8(mdo bskal bzang): snang mdzad grags pa la// sbrang rtsir byas pa'i 'o ma dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs grags pa'i gnyen ded dpon gyi// bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs
354b1(mdo bskal bzang): bden rtogs la// me tog dag gi phreng bul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul la// me tog char ba
354b2(mdo bskal bzang): gang zhig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dka' thub chen po tshong dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs nyi ma'i tog de la/ 'khor rnams thams cad dbul ba byas nas kyang // 
354b3(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs lhun po'i 'od zer 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po de la ni// rin chen yu bar byas pa'i gdugs 'bum phul nas kyang
354b4(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan brtsegs pa bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa de/ la ni// rin chen snam bu lnga ldi dbul ba byas nas kyang // 
354b5(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mchod grags brtsal chen lha'i bu'i bram ze'i tshe/ 'khor ni bye bar bcas ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa po// 'jig rten rno bar grags
354b6(mdo bskal bzang): la khrus kyi yo byad bul/ dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ches grags lam ston tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul byin de la/ 'chags dag ni phyag dar byas nas kya / 
354b7(mdo bskal bzang): dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin 'od dpa' bo tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu grags de la// rgyal mtshan ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni so skyong
354b8(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa klog 'byin grong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub mthu rtsal la// gding ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa bden
355a1(mdo bskal bzang): sems paskyed// bde gshegs can chen 'od zer 'khor lo bsgyur ba la// btsun mo chen bde gshegs yon tan 'byung gnas la/ yu ba nar bus smras pa'i rdza yab phul nas kyang / 
355a2(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs sku gcan gcod pa tshan rnon che// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i bla de ni// lam du zhugs tshe bsil ba'i rlung yab phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni
355a3(mdo bskal bzang): semos bskyod// bde gshogs yon tan rgya mtsho grong brdal gyi// byis pa tshe na bde gshegs byang chub 'od// de tshe tshems shing dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
355a4(mdo bskal bzang): 'od zer ldan pa tshong dpon tshe// bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho la/ mar me kha ni stong snyed phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs rab tu zhi ba stabs gyad kyi tshe// 
355a5(mdo bskal bzang): debazhin gshegs pa byang chub dgos de la/ nor bus spras pa'i mchil lham phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed/ bde gshegs 'jig rten bzang po spros 'tshong bur gyur tshe// de bzhin
355a6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa lnga chen de la phye ma yis/ bkang ba'i na gza' dang ni pad ma phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bod gshegs mya ngan med pa gos 'tsho khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
355a7(mdo bskal bzang): blo gros zang mo de la yang // rdzi char byung ba'i tshe na me tog gdugs phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa shugs bcu rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang
355a8(mdo bskal bzang): phyug can// lam du zhugs tshe gdan dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs stobs rol mo mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gtso chen de la ni/ dung sgra dag ni 'bud/ 
355b1(mdo bskal bzang): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mthu dpal rol mo'i glu 'i // chu bo dag la zam btsugs nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sos de la/ gsum skyabasu 'gro ba
355b2(mdo bskal bzang): gnas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// de bzhi gshegs pa mthu thob mnyan pa'i tshe// chu bo dag la zam pa btsugs nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni
355b3(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen khrus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs la 'khrul med la// khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde
355b4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs yon tan snying po tshong dpon che// bu tshe bde gshegs bsod nams 'phags pa la// d+ha nu ska ra'i me tog gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs
355b5(mdo bskal bzang): pa bden spyod spros 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nor lha'i bu grags la/ spos kyi ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dges mchog
355b6(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs chen sangs rgyas de la sogs// dge slong dag ni dge 'dun spyan ni drangs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa skar mkhan
355b7(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal po shing mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan la// bde gshegs de la thal sbyar phyag byas nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'od zer chen po tshal rgya
355b8(mdo bskal bzang): las// byed che bde gshegs lha'i 'od zer la// ljon pa'i tshon dag sbar te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa klog 'od rdza mkhan tshe// bde gzha
356a1(mdo bskal bzang): gas sa de bya na/ zlum pa nas nga ng+ge las sa du byung chub tun sems pa / bde gshegs san tan chen nud pa'am/ deb na gshegs pa bsas
356a2(mdo bskal bzang): nams dges de la/ ljags kyi snong dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs rin po chen tshong dpon gyi/ bri che bde gshegs seng ge'i blo gros la// mu tig
356a3(mdo bskal bzang): ngag ni chun 'phreng phul nas kyang // ring po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'od spos 'tshong tshe// bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sa gcol// phye mas bkang ba'i ud bal na gza'
356a4(mdo bskal bzang): phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs go cha bgos pa lha'i bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rI/ chen 'od de la/ bstod pa dag gis bstod pa byas nas kyang // dang
356a5(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs go cha bgos pa lha'i bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bzang po la// mi tog dag gi phur ma phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
356a6(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa matog bzang po yig mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la/ blo ba'i glegs ma dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen/ 
356a7(mdo bskal bzang): po shal khyer tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sdug de la/ mar me dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rgya mtsho rol mkhan gyi tshe// rnga bo che dag brdung bar byas nas
356a8(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gtugs de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems brgyad// de bzhin gshegs pas 'dzin 'gar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de 'o// mtshon mngag ni dbul te/ 
356b1(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs don blo lta bu nyi ma'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa med de la/ me tog man d+ha ra ba gtor nas kyang / ngang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
356b2(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs yon tan brdzogs pas rtsegs po sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags lnga bzhud pa la/ 'dam rdzab dag tu rdo leb zam bcugs nas/ dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde ga
356b3(mdo bskal bzang): yon tan tshogs ni sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la/ skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu gcig phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen me ni ded dpon tshe// de bzhin
356b4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa klu'i lha de la/ bai dUr+ya'i snod chus bkang ste bul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa tshong dus pa// byed dus tshe na dge 'dun
356b5(mdo bskal bzang): dag la 'od sgron bu la// de bzhin gshegs pa yo na tan phung po la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'jig rten zla ba 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan
356b6(mdo bskal bzang): tho pa gtsug la ga khang na stong snyed bul nas kyang / rang po byang chub tu sems brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa byungs bsnyen rgyal po sa bram ze'i che/ phyogs pa na'i dge 'dun dag gis bsam ga
356b7(mdo bskal bzang): 'ang btsug sanas/ de bzhin shems pa seM smos cag sul// da nga na ba tu ni sems byung/ dI bzhin sa ngas ga smras gyi/ de bson gzugs pa 'dibarten du 'dag
356b8(mdo bskal bzang): pa dag sungs kyang / dang byang chu tun sems bskyed/ 'ad ni gshi tshig can na pa'i bras pa mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa pa'i brjod da da la/ ra rgyam pa rje mas
357a1(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng ge stabs gling rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog de 'o// ras bcos gding ba dpag tshad gcig phul nas// dang po byang chub
357a2(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs drag shul byin ni tsheng dpon gyi// chung ma tshe na bde gshegs nyi 'od la// phye ma sbar gang dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
357a3(mdo bskal bzang): chos kyi dbang phyug phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od zer la// me tog chal par bkram pa kun phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi'i brjid 'od ni lha'i bu'i
357a4(mdo bskal bzang): tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ston par dgas pa po// byang chub snying por phul te rtswa gdan phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'od zer chen po khyim bdag tshe// de ba nA
357a5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa gsang bar dges de la/ ras bcos bye ba snyed ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs/ rin chen grags rgyal bu gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig na
357a6(mdo bskal bzang): 'du zer la/ zla re sgras can dag na pus nas kyang // dang pa byang chub tu ni sem so bskyed// 'di ga shegs rin chen gas so pa rin chen tshong ba'iH/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'byung gnas de man/ 
357a7(mdo bskal bzang): rin por che dag sbar bar dgang ste gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bsgyid / bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas ded dpon gyi/ bu che bde gshegs ma ga dpa sa del/ nad pa'i tha na
357a8(mdo bskal bzang): na bul nas kyang / dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed/ bide gshegs khyod zer don yod rgya mtsho'i tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phyag ldan de la ni/ mu tig dmar po spar ba bkang ste/ 
357b1(mdo bskal bzang): thul nas kyang / dang pabyang chub tu sems bskyed/ bde gshegs lnga drang srung drang srong mo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma 'o// mo ma dag gi gzugs dag phul nas kyang // dang pa byang chub tu/ 
357b2(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed/ ba gshegs skye bang 'khor mo bsgyur ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'od zer la/ gling dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshes/ 
357b3(mdo bskal bzang): dge 'dun brtan pa mtha' 'khob rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs snyan de ni/ me tog stong snyed bkram pa'i 'chags phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin/ 
357b4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa phyogs bzangs gser 'tsho nga tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la// gser gyi glegs bam bkram pa'i 'chags phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
357b5(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs gtog ni gser 'gar khye bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thar pa'i nyi ma la/ mar me bzang po bshams te/ phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bdeg
357b6(mdo bskal bzang): yul 'khor me tog rtsa 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus brtan de la/ 'chag sa'i rtsas khyabs par bkram nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs chos kyi blo
357b7(mdo bskal bzang): gros tshod dus pa'i tshe// tshong dus par srang dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa blo'i 'od ldan de la ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rlung shugs ltar gshegs
357b8(mdo bskal bzang): tIng d+ha khye'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa de la ni/ gsil yab dag gi g.yab pa byas nas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs legs bsam grags
358a1(mdo bskal bzang): pa gtar mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i blo de la// nor bu skar 'od dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ldan rgyal po'i pho nya tshe/ 
358a2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa dpag med la// lan gsum bskor ba dag ni byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs lnga tshogs 'khor bsgyur bla mchog tshe// de bzhin gabye ba
358a3(mdo bskal bzang): seng ge'i mchog de la// gser dang byi ru dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan bsrung ba 'gron po'i tshe// lam srang dag tu rdo leb bstegs btsugs kyang / 
358a4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mthu' brtsal la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs don gyi blo gros lha mchog gi/ zhabs la mgo bo dag gis phyag dag byas nas
358a5(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni byams bskyed// bde ba/ shegs bsnyengs med chos bsrung ba'i tshe/ nyin gzhag bdun du byams pasgoms nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs nas
358a6(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gros brtan gos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs lha mchog mchod rten la/ khang rtsegs mon dang ngag ni bkab pa bul// dang po d+ya
358a7(mdo bskal bzang): nug tu ni sems sbyong // bde sa shegs 'od gnas 'tshungs pa dge slong mo// dam chos yongasu bzung byir sgro skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa klog gi 'ong zer la/ rang po byang chub tu ni sems bstod
358a8(mdo bskal bzang): bide gshegs nor zhabs tshong dpon bur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dges de la/ me tog ud po la phyag pa gang phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs thar rngon
358b1(mdo bskal bzang): grong dpon bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rgyal mtshan de la ni/ bsod snyoms dang po dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs ngos bzangs
358b2(mdo bskal bzang): byug rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od de la/ zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs blo zangaso phyug po du gyur sangs rgyas kyi/ 
358b3(mdo bskal bzang): dge slong pha don 'don pa bza' byin nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa zlo gas mchog ma de la nA~M/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs kun gzigs rab byung zhag bdun dge slong // 
358b4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa spros kyi dod ldan bcom ldan gyi/ legs par gsungs pa rje su yi rang phul nas kyang // dang po byad nub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes mchog ni dge slong
358b5(mdo bskal bzang): tshe// ting 'dzin 'di la yi rang byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mthu brtsal la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs tshangs gnas rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin
358b6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa blo gros khyad par la// yan lag lnga ldan sil snyan dag gis mchod/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa bdon gsung khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong bsam
358b7(mdo bskal bzang): de la/ lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzangs sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sgron de la/ a ru ra'i 'bras bu
358b8(mdo bskal bzang): dgu phul nas/ rang pa rgyang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde go shegs stobs sbyin cing dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjod 'bar ba yi/ gtsug lag 'ang dag sbyang dum byas nas kyi/ 
359a1(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng ge'i stabs ni rgya mtshar tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma de la ni// byi ru sbyar ba bkang ste gtor ba byas nas kyang // dang
359a2(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs me tog tog ni rgyal rigs gzhon nu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig la dges pa de la ni// rin po che'i phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang
359a3(mdo bskal bzang): nub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes 'byung gnas phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mdzes de la/ pad ma'i rdzing bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
359a4(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs me tog byin pa gnas brtan tshe bde gshegs yon tan dpal gyi snying po yi/ 'chag sar 'byi ba'i gong bu phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyong
359a5(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs yon tan snying po drang srong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa gsal de la/ rgyang ma nas ni thal sbyar phyag byas nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
359a6(mdo bskal bzang): na rten sa te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mangs rnapas del naM/ a ti mug ta ka'i meg gtor nas kyang // dngo'i byo chub tu ni sems bskyed/ 'ad ga shes glags kyi cad 'byung rdzas/ 
359a7(mdo bskal bzang): bu ma bde gshegs nas dag spyan m+b+ha/ rtswa'i sbyin pa dgan dus nas byung / dang nub tu ni sems byung // de gshegs mi tshugs grangs rig khye'u'i no// de bzhin gshegs pa
359a8(mdo bskal bzang): bad+hal cugs sa/ bdur 'i 'bras bu gcig sul naso// rang ba byang chub tu sems paskye'o// di gshegs pa gongs med rgyal chen nam thos bu'i mi// de bzhin gshegs pa gapas dag brtan pa rnaman
359b1(mdo bskal bzang): lha rdzas dag gam tsan dan dag gis gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyal po yi// mdun 'dod byed tshe bde gshegs dpag spyan te// zhag bdun par du gdugs
359b2(mdo bskal bzang): tshod gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshangs par gshegs pa mnyen pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thar par dges de la// chu bo 'gram dge bstan bcing mtshan nas kyang // dang
359b3(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs lha'i mthu brtsal tshong dpon che// phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun sgo gang phul nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen de la ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ 
359b4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs ye shes dges pa rdo mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yul mkhor mchog de la/ lha'i zhal zas dag ni phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa bde sman rtsa
359b5(mdo bskal bzang): 'tshod pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs bar brgyan pa'i 'od de la ni/ dbyen gyi gsos sman dag la rtag tu spyan grangs nas dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nor bu'i
359b6(mdo bskal bzang): snying po nye ba yi// khye'u bde gshegs sa ri las de la// me tog gzhi zhig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye'o// bde gshegs yon tan grags dga' spyod tshe yi// de bzhin gshegs pa
359b7(mdo bskal bzang): yon tan gsal de la// zhugs gling dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes dpal ni bcar ba mkhan bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
359b8(mdo bskal bzang): grags de la/ lhung bzed bca' ba dag gis phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bcings med brten bcas gcig bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa snga ba mchog de ni/ 
360a1(mdo bskal bzang): gdugs tshod gsol tshe sbrang ma bskrad nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs brtul zhugs brtan pa blon che'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dges par gzigs de la// 
360a2(mdo bskal bzang): khang pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs lha'i gzi brjid dam chos nub pa'i tshe// dge slong chos sgra smos shig ces brjod na// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba
360a3(mdo bskal bzang): lta bur gsung de la// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshangs pa rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma'i dbyangs de la// grong khyer dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang
360a4(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dal bzhugs dge slong brgyan pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dpal de la// so pa'i ra ka'i btung phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub
360a5(mdo bskal bzang): tu sems bskyedado// bde gshegs brtul shugs bka' thub phyag dar ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba mkhyen pa po de'i/ lam srang khru bcu phyag dar byas nas kyang // dang byang chub tu ni sems
