360a6(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs 'od zer phung po khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po de/ 'jigs pa med pas dgon par spyan drangs nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bsgyur// bde ga bye
360a7(mdo bskal bzang): gzo brjid rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rims nad med pa yi// blo da mnga' de la brgyan dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gsheg so tsam pa ka ni rgyal khran tshe// de bzhin
360a8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa 'phags pa dul ba la/ a sni ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dgar mdzod bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi lha de la/ 
360b1(mdo bskal bzang): ril ba spyi blugs dag ni dul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshogs can bzang po lha'i bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bdud rtsi de// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba legs pa
360b2(mdo bskal bzang): phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mchod sdong bsrung ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa grong khyer du// gshegs pa'i tshe na mchod sdong dag ni
360b3(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dges chen sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i phung po la// sman gyi ring bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
360b4(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs sna ma'i me tog gar ma kha na tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od dpal de la ni/ sna ma'i me tog dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
360b5(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs sems can 'od ni chang 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra de la ni/ bye mas bsgos pa'i metog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs
360b6(mdo bskal bzang): sku mdzad shing lha'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i nyi ma la/ me tog kar ni ka dag gtor nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mdangs 'gro shing rta mokhan gyi tshe// de bzhin
360b7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa mi bsnyengs thob de la/ bzhugs dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs don legs des ni rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs mkhas pa dges de la// zhag
360b8(mdo bskal bzang): cig bzhugs pa'i gnas ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs khyu mchog blon che'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo mi 'khrul de la// seng ge'i gdan khri dag ni
361a1(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// / bam po nyi shu lnga pa// bde gshegs lag bzangs thams cad byed pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
361a2(mdo bskal bzang): 'gro dga' de la ni/ gos kyi dum bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'od zer chen po'i lag brda tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mchog de la/ skyu ru ra dag dngul
361a3(mdo bskal bzang): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bsam pas byin ni khyab pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul mchog de la/ phyag dag bkru ba'i chab dag phul nas kyang // dang po
361a4(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs bsod nams 'od ni phul ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gdugs de la/ bshos dron bcud dang bcas pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang
361a5(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen dbyings ni ri mo mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bris nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i 'od ldan de la ni// dang po nyid du
361a6(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan 'phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gzi brjid la/ tsam ba ka'i phreng ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
361a7(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs seng ge'i stobs ni phyag dar ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' ni gzigs pa po// bcom ldan de ni phrag par blangs te 'dam rdzab sgral/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
361a8(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs dri med spyan ni 'gro mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pakhrel yod bzang po la/ ka la man ngag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'od bsrungs sbyangs
361b1(mdo bskal bzang): nas dge slong tshe// bde gshegs rgya chen gzugs kyi 'chag sa dag/ lhung bzed 'bru mar bkang bas chag chag btab// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs blo gsal rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin
361b2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa lha'i spyan de la/ 'od zer chen po me tog dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes 'gros ni rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'o tshe// nyams dag tshe na sangs rgyas dag la
361b3(mdo bskal bzang): phyag 'tshal zhes// tshig tu brjod las bde gshegs tshogs kyi 'od zer la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi brjid drag shul 'gar ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mtshan
361b4(mdo bskal bzang): de la/ dngul las byas pa'i lhung bzed phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs 'od zer chen po tshang dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gzhan
361b5(mdo bskal bzang): pa bdag nyid de/ nyin cig bzhugs pa'i gnas byas te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nyi 'od grong brdal byis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan
361b6(mdo bskal bzang): tog de yi// ras kyi gdan dag gding ba byas nas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs dri mod 'ang ni bdun 'od tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang mtshungs de la// chos sbyin dag ni bdu
361b7(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi brjid rnam 'byes chang 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med pa shes gnyen la/ kha ru btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang / 
361b8(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs khyengs med rtsis bra'i khye'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs par bsdus pa'i blo mnga' ba/ ji co'i phub ma pra s+tha gang phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sem spyo// 
362a1(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs sna ci'i zhal ni lham mkhan no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thul de la ni/ me tog ud pal dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs zla'ang
362a2(mdo bskal bzang): brten btsas nad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zam pa'i 'od de la// mon sran gre'u rul dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa klog sbyin rgyal po de'i tshe// 
362a3(mdo bskal bzang): yid 'thad 'ong ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rab zhir gshegs pa shing 'tshong tsho// de bzhin gshegs po rtse gcig 'od de la// chu dron snod dag bkang ste phul
362a4(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed// bde gshegs mi 'khrugs pa yis dge slong dag la ni// ji srad 'tsho bar/ gnod sems med par byed bcug nas// de bzhin gshegs pa
362a5(mdo bskal bzang): sred med bu'i mthu brtsal lo// dang po nyid tu byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs grags pa dag bcom grags pa rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zhabs de la/ 
362a6(mdo bskal bzang): spos kyi za ma tog dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs chos kyi yon tan phya mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dges de la/ khang pa dag ni dbul ba byas
362a7(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs zhing bzong lha'i brtul zhugs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsal de la/ gu gul bdug pa dag gi gdugs nas kyang // dang pa
362a8(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskye // bde gshegs bkod pa'i rgyal po 'khor bsgyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od de la// bye dUr+ya'i khang bzangs phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed// 
362b1(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs mngon 'phags lha la dad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam sgyings la// me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
362b2(mdo bskal bzang): sbyin bsreg 'ang 'dra dang dpon ci/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rlog med la/ gangs dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems po skyed do// bde gshegs pa dpa' byas
362b3(mdo bskal bzang): bo'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa gsal ba po// bde gshegs pad ma'i me tog gtor ba'i tshe/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen bkod pa khyim bdas
362b4(mdo bskal bzang): tshe/ bde gshegs pa nges pa'i blo de la/ khron pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde bshegs shin du mi zang po lam ston bur gyur tshe// de
362b5(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs gti mug spangs de la// ljon pa'i lcug ma nyi shu sed dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin mchog ni shing mkhan tshe// bcom ldan de bzhin gcu
362b6(mdo bskal bzang): pa yon tan phung pa de'i// gtsug lag khang gi sgo dag byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sims bskyed// bde gshegs thugs ni shin du zhungs pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs su
362b7(mdo bskal bzang): ba'i blo de la/ lam srang dag tu gshegs te gos dag gting nas kyang / dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs pargya mtshos byin ni mdun ngon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bskal ldan shing / 
362b8(mdo bskal bzang): tshe/ me tog dag gi zhal med khang pa phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs tog zhing pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhang pa'i mthu bskal la// mon sran gre'u 'bru sbar gang gtor
363a1(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bde gshegs zla gdugs nir yu ta'i ka'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la/ byug pa dag ni dngul ba byas nas kyang // 
363a2(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro spos 'tshong tshe// bde gshegs phyogs rnams gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi// gtsug lag khang dag spos kyis bdugs nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni
363a3(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs pa dri med rgyal po yi// ri mo mkhan tshe bde gshegs son bsal de yi// sgo khang dag ni bris nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes grags pa gos
363a4(mdo bskal bzang): 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nges par rtogs zod/ la// chos gos srang brgya dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan 'od ni mthing gan tshe// de bzhin gabye
363a5(mdo bskal bzang): ba tshogs kyis mi thub pa// mthing por gcig cig dbu la ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgra sgro gas gos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i me tog
363a6(mdo bskal bzang): la de skya rags dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs zla rgyal phyogs rtsi'i dpon po che/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i pad ma la// chung ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang
363a7(mdo bskal bzang): rang bying nub tun sems brjod// bdo gshegs padu ma 'di zer bram pa mo// mtsho'i bu ga shegs kun gamigs la/ debatib par dag ni dul nas kyang / rang po byang chub tun thams paskye/ 
363a8(mdo bskal bzang): dgags ma zugs bshing ba sad spyad macan gyim// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'di dal/ 'dra zus ma pagang dang dadus pabyas mi kya/ dang byang chub tu ni rnams brgyag kyi
363b1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs sgron rgyal bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i tshogs can la/ snum khur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs klog gi tog ni ded dpon na/ 
363b2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi dgos pa lo// na gza' khrugs gcig cig phul nas kyang dang po byang chub t+yA sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'od zer rgyal po rdza mkhan no// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po la/ 
363b3(mdo bskal bzang): khrus rkyen bum pa dag ni dbul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs skar mkhan tshal gyi las byed tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i zhal de la/ lo ma'i gding bdag ni dul
363b4(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs grags rdzogs nor bu tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par dgongs de la/ rin po che'i bla re phul nas byed// dang po bya
363b5(mdo bskal bzang): chub ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs sring stobs 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa'i rgyal mtshan de la ni/ dri gsung ldan pa'i bskyed mos tshal dag phul nas kyang / dang po byung
363b6(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems ba skyed// bde gshegs rgyas ni 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dag de la ni/ rin chen gdugs ni bye ba stong skyed phul// dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs spyan
363b7(mdo bskal bzang): mdzes grong dpon bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mthu bsul la/ me long dag ni bla re phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs rnyog pa med don shing drung tshe// de bzhin go rgya
363b8(mdo bskal bzang): ba tshogs kyi gcod la// tshems shing dbul ba dag ni byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs drag shul sde ni khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spos dang zhim po la// phyag dar snyim
364a1(mdo bskal bzang): pa gang zhig gtor nas kyang / dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsod nams gzi brjid lci 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mu stegs la// lhung bzed / 
364a2(mdo bskal bzang): phyir lci ba'i gong bu phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mthu rtsal che ni rtswa 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs mkhas nams sngags de la// rtswa gur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po
364a3(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bo gshegs thogs med blo ni 'gar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 'od de la// mtshon cha dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
364a4(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs sgra gcan lho ni lcags 'gar gyi// khye'u yi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po// ye shes go cha la ni khab phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes
364a5(mdo bskal bzang): phung po 'greg mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mdang sa de la// bsreg shang dag ni dbus pa byas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems da skyed// bde gshegs kha mo bsgyur ba dbus po'i tshe// de bzhin
364a6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul la/ mchil lham rim cig pa dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems tu ni sems bskyed// bde gsheg skye dbang mtshungs ni grong khyer na/ brten tshe bde gshegs sangs
364a7(mdo bskal bzang): rgyas dges des/ tsa D+yan grozla dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bsno // bde gshegs ma tog ni rgya mtsho mo// khye'u chen bde gshegs pasal rgyal sa/ mtshal ma'i snong dag du
364a8(mdo bskal bzang): bya sa kya/ dang ba kye+e slo ni sems paskyed/ de gi gas gcan 'dzin rdzogs 'a sa/ de bzhin ga mas pa mas cad rigs gro ma ldan den zin mo cang nas kyang/ 
364b1(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs rtsi sman chen po thabs mkhas tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis nam mnos la// ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed
364b2(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs rgyu skar rgyal po tshong dus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa don ni legs par dgongs de la/ bum pa mar gyis bkang ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sem so bskyed// bde gshegs/ 
364b3(mdo bskal bzang): sman pa'i rgyal po tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po de la ni// lha'i khang bzang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gtso mdzad sman
364b4(mdo bskal bzang): sman 'tshong ma'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhas pa cher gsal ba/ me long zhabs la sku ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang bo byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa
364b5(mdo bskal bzang): mkhas pa gsal de la// me long dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rnam grags rgya la po 'khrungs pa'i tshe// khye'u chen bde gshegs bsdu
364b6(mdo bskal bzang): blo mnga' ba/ 'dag pa'i tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer dge slong g.yar gnas pa// rim 'gro ba che de bzhin gshegs pa g.yang kan+da
364b7(mdo bskal bzang): pa/ de khrus chub dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa chos dka' can gyi mo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen gnasu phyin pa la/ mtshan mo mar mo dag ni dngul
364b8(mdo bskal bzang): pa byas nas kyang // dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dag slong babang po sman pa'i ne// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge nar rol// ya dur dag dbul pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
365a1(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan dbang mtshungs rtsa thun tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rin chen la// ba tra ka ri dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni ses bskyed/ 
365a2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sde ni tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun dga' la// lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shes// 
365a3(mdo bskal bzang): rab brtsegs ni mngon pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa b+ha ra ka rdo rje yis// lam srang dag na mtshon pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegaso pa legs gnas bram
365a4(mdo bskal bzang): ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dbyangs de la// byed// las byas pa'i gtugs phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs phreng rgyud tshe// 
365a5(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma stabs de la// sna ma'i me tog bdun zhig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshangs dbyangs lam ston khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
365a6(mdo bskal bzang): ded dpon de la ni// gser gyi me tog dag gis gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan mchog ni zhing pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i zla ba la/ bal sran sngon po sbar
365a7(mdo bskal bzang): gang gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs 'brug sgra'i dbyangs ni rtsis pa'i khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la/ phreng ba chen po dag ni phul nas kyang // da
365a8(mdo bskal bzang): bo byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs mngon shes tog ni rigs gtso'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la// dang bdug pa dag ni bul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
365b1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa tog 'od rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes dag ldan pa de'i// zhabs gnyis dag ni bkru ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa
365b2(mdo bskal bzang): dge ba khyim bdag tshe// bde gshegs srid mtha' nor bu spos de la// rgun sman sbyar dug dag ni gsol nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs tshangs pa 'thing bu chod pa'i tshe
365b3(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bar gnas de la/ 'thing bu'i nor bu dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs skyes mchog tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa
365b4(mdo bskal bzang): grags pa bsdus de la/ gur kum dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs spyan sdug spos 'tsheng khye'u'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa
365b5(mdo bskal bzang): tshangs pas mchod de la/ spos kyi bye ma sbar gang gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs klu byin rdza mkhan chung ma'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs d+ma ro chen po la/ 
365b6(mdo bskal bzang): chu yis bkang ba'i snod dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa bden tog tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dges de la/ gser gyi khri stan dag ni phul
365b7(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po dang po tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa brgyan pa'i spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa gsal de la/ spos kyi phur ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang pa
365b8(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs zhum med dbyangs ni lcags 'gar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas la// lcags las byas pa'i snod dag yul nas kyang / dang po byang
366a1(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen 'od ni ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'od zer la// spos kyi bdug gu dag gis gdugs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 
366a2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni byin pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bzod de la// dpyid ka cha bran gong bu phul nas kyang / dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng ge dag ni 'ag
366a3(mdo bskal bzang): ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog chen po la// de la khab dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs 'od zer sna tshogs sha na mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs
366a4(mdo bskal bzang): pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid de la ni/ sha na dag las byas/ pa'i na gza' phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs ye shes dpa' bo grong brdal gyi/ khye'u tshe na
366a5(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal la/ la du dag las byas pa'i dbul ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bde gshegs pad ma'i phung po rtsis pa yi// khye'u'i tshe na de bzhin
366a6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa mkhas blo la// me tog snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas kyang // bde gshegs me tog rgyas pa lam lnga'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nor byin de la ni// dus ma yin par bcud ldan btung ba
366a7(mdo bskal bzang): yul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mthu brtsal bstabs ni ral ba can// sbyin bsreg mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po// zhum med dbyangs la zhugs ling phul nas kyang // 
366a8(mdo bskal bzang): dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bod gshegs bsod nams phung po tshang pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la// lhung bzed sgreng rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang
366b1(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzugs mchog grong khyer phul bsrung ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla bzang po la/ btung ba byin gyis brlabs pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni seMs
366b2(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa skur tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i bzugs de la/ spos kyi rgyu dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs
366b3(mdo bskal bzang): pa zlo ba'i sgron ma slongs mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor sems pa la/ 'gron bu nyi shu dag ni gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi brjid phung po rtsa
366b4(mdo bskal bzang): thun tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zab mor gnas de la// rtswa las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs byang chub rgyal po shing rta'i// 
366b5(mdo bskal bzang): mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dpal lo la// shi rta dag ni dbul ba byas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bod gshegs mi zad shing rta mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
366b6(mdo bskal bzang): rab tu gdul dka' la/ bzhugs khri dag ni dbul ba byas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni dbul sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon rtogs spyan sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de
366b7(mdo bskal bzang): la/ ldag sman dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yan lag rgyas pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa pa'i sgron de la/ lhung bzed dar bas bkang ste
366b8(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shes rab yul 'khor shes rab mar 'tshang che// de bzhin gshegs pa bsal ba'i dpal nga la// zhun mor srang brgyad dag ni phul na
367a1(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ni bong rtsi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gzugs de la/ bzhugs pa'i rdo gdan dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po
367a2(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi brjid tshim mdzad rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mu stegs la// ze'u 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyod
367a3(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs shes rab byin ni mar 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la// mar khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam
367a4(mdo bskal bzang): dbyangs rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog de la// ril ba chus bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed // de bzhin gshegs pa mgon po rigs bu'i
367a5(mdo bskal bzang): tshe// bde gshegs bzang po'i ngo tsha mkhyen pa la/ 'chags dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs chag mdo mdzod ni mi bkren tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'am
367a6(mdo bskal bzang): bar 'os de la// tshod ma'i gong bu dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bdi gshegs gtso bos byin ni lha'i bu/ dbang phyug che de de bzhin gshegs pa po// seng ge'i nga ro de la bstod
367a7(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bsil chen po la// sbos po'i richu dag ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni se sbyin
367a8(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs ye shes mthu brtsal shing bsrung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gsal de la/ ko byaM da ra'i matog phul nas kyang / dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'gro
367b1(mdo bskal bzang): dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi snod de la// bu ram chu dag dbul ba byas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
367b2(mdo bskal bzang): dga' ba'i dpal de la/ bskyed mos tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa shugs 'chang tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam
367b3(mdo bskal bzang): par gnas pa po// de la gtugs dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs skar rgyal 'khor los bsgyur ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi blo de 'khor bcas
367b4(mdo bskal bzang): ther 'bum dag/ g.yar gnas tshen phongs pa med bas spyan drangs nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zangs tshong dus tshe// de bzhin gshegs mthu rtsal
367b5(mdo bskal bzang): chen po la/ sbrang rtsi ci bzhed pa dag phul nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs grags byin 'jam gling rgyal po yi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog de yi// 
367b6(mdo bskal bzang): gtsug la khang ni bye ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa shugs ltar brtan de dag la// spos ni sbar gyi
367b7(mdo bskal bzang): bzhi cha phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po gser tog tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la// khron pa zlum po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po bya
367b8(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thal bar klog de la/ mchod sbyin chen po dag ni byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde/ 
368a1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs seng ge'i sde ni dbang thun gyi/ bu che de bzhin gshegs pa drags mchog la/ bskyed mas tshal dbul ba byas nas kyang / bde gshegs nar lha'i buni tshong dpon du mo che// de bzhin
368a2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'o// de la zhal dkru ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs grags pa rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
368a3(mdo bskal bzang): pa blo brtan de la ni// rang gi brgyan rnams dag gis gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rgyal po rgyal po'i bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od zer can// de la
368a4(mdo bskal bzang): thod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs rgya chen snying po tshang pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshe gas pa dbyangs chen de la ni// mu tig dag las byas pa'i rtags
368a5(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// de gshegs bsod nams 'od zer lcags bsrungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs gsal de la ni/ sog ma dag las byas pa'i phreng ba
368a6(mdo bskal bzang): phul/ dang po byung chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrung don 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la ni/ lhung bzed 'bru mar dag gis bkang ba phul// dang
368a7(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs sgron rgyal rtsis pa'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu brtsal chen po la/ me tog 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed
368a8(mdo bskal bzang): bod gshegs ye shes pa phyogs ni ldangs dag go// pha nyi chen de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bdud rtsi bsal ba sbrang rtsi'i gtung ba phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
368b1(mdo bskal bzang): mchog shing bsrungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub mthu brtsal la// ma du lung ga dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas bdag khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gabye
368b2(mdo bskal bzang): pa smra mchog sems pa la// khang pa brtsegs pa gos kyis g.yog pa dag/ phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs grol brnyes btso klag mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros
368b3(mdo bskal bzang): drag shul la// ras yug khra bo dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gtsug gser tshong dpon khye'u yi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha'i mthu brtsal la// gser gyi buM
368b4(mdo bskal bzang): ba dag ni dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed bde gshegs sgra gcan bzang po slong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs brtul shugs chen po la// rtsa ba'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas
368b5(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs thub dka' mgo ro'i ka'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'bar ba yi// gshegs zam dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang pa
368b6(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa thub gsal tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med blo la// dung dag spar ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// 
368b7(mdo bskal bzang): bi gshegs zla ba'i 'od zer tshong dpon tshe// khye'u tshen bde gshegs seng ge'i dbyangs de la/ kham bor mar khus bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gser 'od tshong
368b8(mdo bskal bzang): dpon dur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa shin du dges de la// mu tig chun phreng dag ni dbul byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs lha'i yon tan dang po blon che'i tshe// de bzhin/ 
369a1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa legs par gnas pa la// dpag tshad gcig pa'i bskyed mos tshal dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa chos gdugs bram ze'i
369a2(mdo bskal bzang): tshe'i tshe// ri'i rtse mo nas ni bdag 'chongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bsod nams lag ni tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs
369a3(mdo bskal bzang): pa bdud rtsi'i sgron ma de la ni// me tog mya ngan tshang dag phul nas kyang / dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs chags med spos 'tshong khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub stags
369a4(mdo bskal bzang): de la/ mon sran gre'u phul gsum zhig ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed // bde gshegs ye shes gya nom rgyal bu'i tshe// pho nya tshe na bde gshegs rgyal ba yi// bshes gnyen
369a5(mdo bskal bzang): lan cig bskor byas nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs blo zhib rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshe gas pa legs par gzigs de la// bum pa chus bkang ste phul nas
369a6(mdo bskal bzang): kyang rje dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzhi chen thams cad ded dpon tshe// dge 'dun drang por zhal zas gsol nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med don la/ dang po byang chub tu ni
369a7(mdo bskal bzang): sems paskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa tsho sman lag za'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gtogs pa'i mchog de la/ skyu nur dag dngul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// gagags rnam/ 
369a8(mdo bskal bzang): grol zag ni brten byas te// 'das baparda bdag tu tham pa btsugs nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma'i tha ba la// dang po byang chub tun sems pastod// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzod ni ba'i/ de banin/ 
369b1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni// me tog dmar po de la phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes rgyal po 'bras sa luH khur ba'i tshe na bde gshegs kun 'od la// me tog
369b2(mdo bskal bzang): dkar ni ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'jigs med mdzad pa dpa' bo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa la// rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul byas nas
369b3(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs chu bo spong ni grong brdal byis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgyings pa yi// bskabs la me tog ud pal ngag gis gtor nas kyang / 
369b4(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs thogs med grags pa slong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' de la ni// mo tsan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
369b5(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs bden pa'i phung po chang 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang mtshungs de la// rdza rnga dge ni lo ma phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin
369b6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa dbyangs spyan rtsa 'tshang che// de bzhin gshegs pa bstabs chen de la ni/ rtswa spyil dag ni byas te dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ri dbang mtshungs ni
369b7(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal bu'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs// de la gtugs dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni dbul ba ba sems skyed// bde gshegs chos brtsegs lha'i bsnyen
369b8(mdo bskal bzang): bkur ba/ byed che bde gshegs bsod nams brtsegs pa la// me tog chag pa gang ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs thar pa'i gzi brjid rgyal bu'i tshe// 
370a1(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i zla ba la// tsug ku ru ka'i 'bras bu brgyad phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs legs mdzad gar mkhan bu mo'i che// de bzhin
370a2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa spyan sdug de la ni// ras sbal dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rab bzhi sku ni phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par grags de
370a3(mdo bskal bzang): la te tsam pa ka'i phreng ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yid 'ong gsung ni dmag mi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la// ras yug dag ni dbul
370a4(mdo bskal bzang): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbyangs sman pa'i tshe// bde gshegs/ seng ge'i mche ba dgongs mal du// 'bru mar dag ni dbul ba
370a5(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha gdugs mkhan tshe// de bzhin gabye pa rin chen 'od de la/ dus gsum bsil yab dag ni phul nas
370a6(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu na sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i logs ni ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim 'od de la/ ston mo chen po dag ni byas nas kyang // dang po byang
370a7(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs chos kyi mthu bsngal rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bzhir 'gyur ba la/ dngul las byas pa'i gdan khri phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
370a8(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bdo gshegs bskal pa babang po dede dpon mo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i mthu de la// gser las byas pa'i bla re bul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// da rtse
370b1(mdo bskal bzang): mi 'khrugs mdog ni rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo de la// rdzu 'phrul dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang \u0f7fdang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi brjid rgyal po grong / 
370b2(mdo bskal bzang): dpon tshe// grong khyer dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid go bgod la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs mdzad lag bla'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
370b3(mdo bskal bzang): pa nges par rtogs bzod 'o// ka ra bi ri'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs spyan legs phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs zla mchog dpal de la
370b4(mdo bskal bzang): lhung bzed mo ra nas bkang phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs don gnas blo ni nad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i stobs de yi// nyin mo zhugs
370b5(mdo bskal bzang): po'i gnas khang phul chags nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bong gshegs don gnas blo ni nad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i gtso de la// mar me'i snying po dag ni
370b6(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa spos gzi rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa dges de la/ ud pal sngon po gcig cig phul nas kyang // dang po/ 
370b7(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs kun dga' mdzad cing rtag mkhan tshe// de bani gshegs pa ud pa la dri de la/ snam phyis dag byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde
370b8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs don yod gshegs pa lag bla'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi dbang phyug la// lo ma'i lcil po byas te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs khro bcom chod
371a1(mdo bskal bzang): dpon bur gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa'i mchog de la/ rdzing bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzugs mchog thag pa'i tshe
371a2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa brtul shugs snyoms pa la// g.yar gnas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs legs gshegs rol mo mkhan gyi tshe// de
371a3(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa shis pa'i dpal de la// rol mo'i rnga chen brdungs te mchod nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rab sbyin grags pa la gus sa byed tshe// de bzhin
371a4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po de la ni// 'dag pa'i chagadag sbyar te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde/ gshegs lnga nyi phyugs rje'i dpon po che// de bzhin
371a5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa 'dam las rgal ba la// zhun mar ci dgos pa ni dbul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shes rab byin ni phug mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs
371a6(mdo bskal bzang): pa mtha' yas spyan de la// phug dag byas te dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mnyam gzhag bdag nyid khyim bdag che// de bzhin gshegs pa blo 'bar
371a7(mdo bskal bzang): de la ni// til 'bru slar gang bkang ste gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi mdangs 'bru mar spos can mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par
371a8(mdo bskal bzang): 'os pa'i dpal de la/ sa ma'i matog yod pa'i 'bru mar srang brgyad phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal rigs lam ston tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sna
371b1(mdo bskal bzang): tshogs dbyangs de la// lam srang dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang / drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bde gshegs bskal ldan shing rta bu ram mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa de la/ 
371b2(mdo bskal bzang): ru ra de'i bcud khu dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems ba skyed// de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog tsha 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang mar gnas de la dag/ zla ba gsum
371b3(mdo bskal bzang): du tshal spyan grangs nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rnam par grol gtsug shing bsrung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim spos de la// num 'brum bcud khu dag ni phul
371b4(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde/ gshegs chos ldan yur ba mkhan// yur ba dag ni skos te byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/ dang pa

371b6(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa grags spangs sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa metog de la ni/ 'bru mar btung ba dag ni dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu/ sems bskyed// bde
371b7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs ye shes mdzod ni thags bzangs mkhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog de la/ ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bodade gshegs
371b8(mdo bskal bzang): tshangs gshegs cong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os de la// me tog 'bar shi'i spyan breng phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs
373a1(mdo bskal bzang): ba tsan dan tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang brtsegs pa la// bso dag las byas pa'i gdan khri phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
373a2(mdo bskal bzang): mya ngan 'das med gser 'gar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni// dngul las byas pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu mi sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i
373a3(mdo bskal bzang): 'od zer li/ a ba ka rar gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la// snang ba'i mdzod la a ba kan phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde bshegs yul 'khor tog ni tshong pa'i tshe// bde
373a4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs sna tshogs dbyangs kyis brgyan de la// gso// nye ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu seMs bskyed// bde gshegs pad ma'i snying po dge slong tshe/ 
373a5(mdo bskal bzang): 'dzab dag las gzugs ni byas nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi brjid mtha' yos tshong 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa gsal de la//

373a7(mdo bskal bzang): del// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdo ga shegs shes rab tog ni mi tog sdug 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes 'od l-i// spug gi nor bu dag ni phul nas kyang // rang po byad/

373b1(mdo bskal bzang): skyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mi gas 'byor ldan na/ shing na mkhan med pa ni gshegs gsal ba dpal/ de yi rlung skyabs dag ni byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems paskyed// de bzhin pa / 
373b2(mdo bskal bzang): pa rmongs dbyig shing bsrung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar grags de la// nag ga dag dul ba byas nas kyang // dang po khyong po byung chub tu ni sems bskyed// ba ga shegs phyag ni rin chen rgyal po ni/

373b4(mdo bskal bzang): gnyis rnam gnon la// kha DU ra'i 'bras bu rgyad dul nas/ dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bang gshegs rdzogs par bsrung che shing bsrungs kyi// de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma/ 
373b5(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal po la// spu kha na ga dwe ga ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mtsho ga gsungs shing bsrungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gnas
373b6(mdo bskal bzang): kyi me tog la// go ra ta ra na'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod 'os rgyal bu'i tshe// rdzing bu dag ni byas te bshams nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu na/ 
373b7(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs nyi ma blon po chen po'i tshe// bdi gshegs rnam par smin pa chen po la// rdo las byas pa'i khang pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
373b8(mdo bskal bzang): 'dam rgyalo skud 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa drags pa chen po la// skud pa srang cig dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shos bsnyes pa chang 'a
374a1(mdo bskal bzang): tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs dges de la ni/ bcud khu'i btung ba dag ni bus nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa grub pagrong dpon dben no// de bzhin
374a2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa bdu rtsi rnam gnon la// slong gi mchogs bcu gcig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// nga gshegs mtho 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i ru
374a3(mdo bskal bzang): bo la// me tog 'bar shis sgos pa'i 'bru mar thul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs po chos sbyin rgyal bu'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dbyangs de la// sil snyan brgya
374a4(mdo bskal bzang): yis mchod pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa phan bzhed 'gar ba'ide bzhin gshegs pa lha'i me tog de la ni// dra dri dag ni dbul ba byas
374a5(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ldan pa dang 'bud tshe// dung sgra dag ni 'bud pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gash+ye
374a6(mdo bskal bzang): pa rnam dag 'od de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ston ka'i nyi ma la/ nor bu bye dUr+ya dag phul nas kyong // dang po byang chub
374a7(mdo bskal bzang): dA ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs 'od zer bya ba lo ma khur khyer tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba lta na sdug de la// ti min 'dza'i la'i me tog phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
374a8(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs bye dUr+ya'i snying po shing bsrungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i blo de la/ am 'dra dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shing
374b1(mdo bskal bzang): bsrungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa'i matog la// tang ka'i metog dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs lnga'i rgyal ba ded dpon no// de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang
374b2(mdo bskal bzang): dbyangs de la/ bskyed mos tshal ni bcu dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'gar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud brtsi'i mchog de la// ril pa spyi blugs
374b3(mdo bskal bzang): dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dran 'ong ljags 'gar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra de la/ snar thugs pa'i spyad dul nas kyang // dang
374b4(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa// dge slong dge 'od tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i lha de la// nor bu'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni ses
374b5(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// dri bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog ma kun gyi 'od// tshong pa'i tshe na bde bshegs dbyangs mchog la// shing na ka'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// 
374b6(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i dpal// phyag dar ba tshe bde gshegs dpal dges la// gtsug lag khang dang phreng ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs skyes du/ 
374b7(mdo bskal bzang): zla ba bram ze'i tshe// cong rong dag tu zam pa byas nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi grags pa la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshe
374b8(mdo bskal bzang): bla chos kyi me tog gi/ gdan dag yud tsam gding ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed // bde gshegs bdud rtsi'i don ni gzhan dran che// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la/ na
375a1(mdo bskal bzang): ka mo zhugs pa'i gnas su gdan gtid nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mchog mtshong dpon gyi// bu che bde gshegs 'jig rten bla ma la/ d+hA nA kar
375a2(mdo bskal bzang): matog gton na kyang / drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ dri bzhin gshegs po skar 'a deng dan ma// 'dre gshegs mchog lam du zhugs pa ni// mtshan mo sgron dag nI phul nas kyang / 
375a3(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// drod gshegs zhi ba'i bstobs ni rgyal po'i bu/ khang bzangs 'dzeg tshe bde gshegs ldan 'od la// me tog gi rgyan po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub ni sems
375a4(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs ye shes rgya mtsho mi bkren tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od gzi la// skyu ru ra dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs
375a5(mdo bskal bzang): ri dbang phreng rgyud bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshe gas pa byang chub gzi brjid la/ me tog phreng ba dag ni khru gang phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rab zhi san pa
375a6(mdo bskal bzang): khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs par sbyangs pa la// srung gi gso sman dag ni dbul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan mtha' stobs spyad rdzi'i che/ 
375a7(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi 'od de la/ tsan dan tso d+h+ri ka dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs lnga dbang rtsis pa khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'dul de lan
375a8(mdo bskal bzang): me tog mya ngan tshang gi chun po phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi me tog gi bzhugs khang spos kyi byug pas
375b1(mdo bskal bzang): byugs nas kyang / dang po byang chub ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ngos bzangs bstsal chen bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po la/ 'dun khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang po bya
375b2(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas mi bkren tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgongs de la// snod dag chus bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
375b3(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs yon tan dpal ni gzi brjid dpal ni khyim bdag tshe// dge 'dun dag la rnyed pa snum bag phul nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub pad ma de la ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni som skye// 
375b4(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs zla med mkhyen ldan rtsis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la/ gur gum lag pa byugs pas phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gau rgya
375b5(mdo bskal bzang): nga ro dpag med phyugs rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin ga shegs pa 'dam las rgal ba la// ha ri ni ka'i me tog gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzangs spos
375b6(mdo bskal bzang): 'tsheng tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa gsal ba la/ kun du ra'i bdug pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shin du thugs bzhungs mi bkren tshe// de bzhin gabye
375b7(mdo bskal bzang): bya chos kyi matog la// thal mo sbyar bar byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa don dgongs gti mug thal/ 'khor lo bsgyur tshe bde gshegs dpal chen la
375b8(mdo bskal bzang): grong khyer dpag tshad bcu pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dbyangs kyi yan lag khyang bar 'phags/ shing bsrungs chen pod gshegs 'ang zhen la/ khe gu'i
376a1(mdo bskal bzang): 4/ bu dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mchog tu mdzes gshegs brtsis pa yis// bran mo'i tshe na bde gshegs me 'od la// me tog dkar ni ka ras gtor nas kyang // 
376a2(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs zhi don rgyal po'i pho brang tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa balngan stug de la/ lan grangs brgya snyed bskor ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
376a3(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa skyon med brten bcas tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar dges de la// mon sran gre'u 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs blo dbyangs
376a4(mdo bskal bzang): dges pa shing 'tshong tshe// sgo gang dag dag ni/ dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs pad ma'i mdzod ni dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mcho
376a5(mdo bskal bzang): sbyin byin pa lnga/ sku'i khrus dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od zer bzang bo dbul po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i ma
376a6(mdo bskal bzang): brgyal la/ bsod snyoms dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs smos pa'i mdog ni shing bsrungs tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med blo de la/ tsu
376a7(mdo bskal bzang): me tog dag ni dbul bas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs 'od de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ thal mo sbyar ba te phyag dag byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems
376a8(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs tshogs dbang tshong dpon bur gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i snying po la// na brgyan phreng ba dag ni dbul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs
376b1(mdo bskal bzang): ba snyengs bral bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od de la/ me tog ta ra na yis gtor ba'i tshe// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzhed pa dbul ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
376b2(mdo bskal bzang): pa bkod pa chen po la// phongs pa med pas spyan dag drangs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde bshegs spyan dka' thub can gyi mo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i 'od de la/ lo ma'i spel po
376b3(mdo bskal bzang): ngag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bsad// de bzhin gshegs pa blo mchog tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo mchog tshong pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mchog de la ni// a ka ru'i
376b4(mdo bskal bzang): bdug pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu nisems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba shing thun tshe// de bzhin gshegs ba zhi ba'i 'od de la/ ba ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang tho
376b5(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin go zhesab rin chen blo 'di tshong ba'i tshe/ bde gshegs yid gnyis las ni 'das pa las// nor bu rin chen me shel phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sos
376b6(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed/ bde gshegs snyoms med 'dun 'don bur gyur tshe// bde gshegs 'phrul pa med pa'i blo ldan la/ sin du ba ra'i me tog phul nas kyang / dang po byang tu ni sems bskyed// byed gshegs gzis
376b7(mdo bskal bzang): ba chen po rtswa thun tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs 'byor de la/ a ka ru'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs smin pa'i tshe// de bzhin ga bye
376b8(mdo bskal bzang): pa yan lag mdzes pa la/ rgya shug 'bras bu'i phreng ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dbyang bzangs lha ris pa'i tshe// bu yug langs tshe khang pa chags nas kyang // de bzhin
377a1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa stengs med dges de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shes rab che stegs nad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grags dbyangs de la// pi bi
377a2(mdo bskal bzang): ling gi 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bde gshegs blo gros zla med tshong pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni chen po de// nyi ma 'ga' zhig bzhugs
377a3(mdo bskal bzang): par gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu bde gshegs rdo rje 'khrigs ni byis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed ldan la// til dang bsres pa'i 'bras dag phul nas kyang // dang po
377a4(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu/ sems bskyed do// bde gshegs byang chub blo gros rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa chen po la me tog 'ba' shig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
377a5(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs ljon shing dbang po'i rgyal po yi// pho nya tshe na bde gshegs gzugs gsal ba// skye rags gcig cig dbul ba byas nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
377a6(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs snyan 'gron po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bsngal chen po de/ 'jigs pa med pas lam kar spyan grangs nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde
377a7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs bsod nams stobs ni tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gzigs de la// zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs
377a8(mdo bskal bzang): pa mthu dpal dge slong tshe// zod pa dag ni bsgom pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 'phags pa dgas pa dgon pa'i dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs
377b1(mdo bskal bzang): pa zhi bar gsal de la/ sran gyi bye rtsal dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu brtsal phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rims med dpal de la/ 
377b2(mdo bskal bzang): 'bras bu sar pa mchog dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs skar dges bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom stegs de la/ snod dag sbrang
377b3(mdo bskal bzang): rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs shin gyi rnga sgra spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo ldan legs bsags la/ u shi ri'i phye ma phul nas kyang // dang
377b4(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// de bzhin gshegs/ pa spyan dga' stusdug pa'i zhal// phyag dar pa che rnga chen brdugs nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gsal de la// dang po byang chub tu ni
377b5(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes bzang ldan mdun dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa glazi brjid la// snod dag 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin
377b6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa 'byor ldan brten banas tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mchod gnas la// la tu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs yon phung kun rgyu'i tshe/ 
377b7(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbyangs de la/ kri sA sa ri'i lpags pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// ba de gshegs gsol ba rgyal po'i bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog
377b8(mdo bskal bzang): nyi ma la/ gser gyi phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs chos kyi rgyal mtshan slong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs gnas zhabs de la// gos kyi ras
378a1(mdo bskal bzang): ma sor bzhi tsam phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs ye shes nga ro tshong dpon gyi/ bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gsal tog la/ tshems shing dag ni dbul
378a2(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i shing thun tshe// bde gshegs sngar ma'i metog gsal de la// brgya shug dag ni me tog phul nas kyang // dang bro byang chu
378a3(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mchod sbyin nga ro brten bcas tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi 'od de la// ngal sran gre'u dang sbyar ba'i 'bru mar bul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
378a4(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs shes rab rnam 'god nga ro ni// ral pa can tshe bde gshegs nga ro bzhengs// de la dka' thub gnas dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
378a5(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs gzi brjid yon tan 'od zer ba za'i brjid bzang mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog de la ni// chos bsnams sbyar dag ni sgrub pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
378a6(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs drang srong dpon po bsod nams tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mdzes pa la/ khab ral dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
378a7(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs blo ldan phyugs spyi'i dpon pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bzang mdzad la/ lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ 'de
378a8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs spobs pa'i tshogs ni rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od de la// tsam pa ka'i me tog tshal dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mchod sbyin
378b1(mdo bskal bzang): bzang po shing thun tshe// bde gshegs kun du yon tan mchod de/ shing bal dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam rgyal la/ 
378b2(mdo bskal bzang): zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs kun gzigs pa da nur mkhan// byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lhas mchod la/ bag chos dag
378b3(mdo bskal bzang): ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// / bam po nyi shu rtsa drug pa// / de bzhin gshegs pa brtul bral 'dreg mkhan tshe// 
378b4(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbyangs de la// skra gri dog ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyad // bde gshegs yon tan tshogs ni 'khrul pa med par sbyor
378b5(mdo bskal bzang): ba la/ khrus khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs me tog ldan pa khyim pang ga tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po 'o// 
378b6(mdo bskal bzang): 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba dag/ g.yar gnas zla ba gsum zhal zas ro brgya zas gsol nas/ dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yul 'khor spobs pa dbul po'i tshe/ 
378b7(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong dbyangs de la/ mar me'i snying po nI phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin bye ma byed pa'i tshe// nyi ma gcig cig tshangs par spyod pa marnam
378b8(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun du dbyang sa de la/ dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de gshegs tha ba dgos pa rgyal po'i tshu mo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam sbyangs pa la// sbyin ga
379a1(mdo bskal bzang): me tog gi gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs khyengs med bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dod de la ni/ mar khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas
379a2(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs ni bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab stobs de la/ am 'dra'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang // 
379a3(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dbang po bsgyur rgyal khyim bdag tshe// bu tshe bde gshegs kun du gzigs de la// sle tres lo ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang
379a4(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs bdud rtsi bsal ba shing srungs 'tshong mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod de la/ gser sna ma dag ni dbul ba byas/ 
379a5(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bsam gtan snyoms pa shing bsrungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i me tog la// me tog dag ni dbul ba byas/ 
379a6(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bde gshegs 'khrugs med tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i blo de la// nor bu rin chen glegs ma phul nas kyang / dang po
379a7(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dri ma rab zhi phyug po yi/ bu che de bzhin gshegs pa brlabs 'joms la/ gang bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems
379a8(mdo bskal bzang): bskyad// bde gshegs phyogs ma smad pa khyim bdag gi/ bu tshe bde gshegs shes rab rdzogs pa la/ mar khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs/ 
379b1(mdo bskal bzang): mdzes pa bu ram shing ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tsher ma dkrugs pa la// bu ram shing dag dbul ba byas pa la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal bzangs tshong
379b2(mdo bskal bzang): ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'dul de la ni// mu tig dmar po dag gis gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shugs gnas ye shes rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin
379b3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa dgra bcom dgos pa la// bum pa chus bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdi gshegs gsung dbang bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khris
379b4(mdo bskal bzang): mchod gnas la// bca' ba dag ni dbul ba byas na/ kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi brjid sman pa chen po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs man
379b5(mdo bskal bzang): dgongs pa la/ skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bod gshegs blo gros zab mo khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa snyengs med la// 
379b6(mdo bskal bzang): mu tig 'bras bu gsum dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bde gshegs bdud rtsi gzhan gyi khol po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus gsal ba del
379b7(mdo bskal bzang): ni/ 'chag sar ljon shing rig byed bskon nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bde gshegs chos stobs tshal gyi las byed tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal rgyal chen po la/ 
379b8(mdo bskal bzang): ma'i tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gshegs pa gsal ba'i blo ldan la// rtsa ba'i ro bcud dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sa skyed
380a1(mdo bskal bzang): bang gshegs me tog 'od ni las ston no// de bzhin gshegs pa smrab med dgangs pa pa/ lam dag nye bar mtshon par byas nas kyang / dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ zung / 
380a2(mdo bskal bzang): gshogs khams gsum mchod gnas gser tog tshe// de bzhin gshegs/ snyengs med 'od zer la// gser srang gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde
380a3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying po phye 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dbyangs can de la ni// kar sha pa ni ri ba'i phye dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gash+ye
380a4(mdo bskal bzang): pa lhas mchod brtsal chen bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gsungs pa de'i ni/ 'khor gyi khyams dag gser gyi snam bus bting nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
380a5(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs thar pa'i rgyal mtshan ras bal mkha/ byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas mchog la// ras bal dag gis gtor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bed
380a6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs bdud rtsi'i 'od ni gtsang sbra can gyi ma// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po de la ni/ sur dang sha ni me tog gtor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin ga
380a7(mdo bskal bzang): ba rdo rje mi dkren tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po sbas pa la/ rgyu sran dag gi phye ma dag ni phul nas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa phreng rgyud tshe// de ba ni/ 
380a8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa thar pa'i bsam gtan la/ sab ta pra ra rna'i me tog gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs snang ldan chen po lam du zhugs pa na// bde gshegs rin
380b1(mdo bskal bzang): phung po 'gron po byed pa yis// nam gyi gung thun dag la mel tshe byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs mdzes gshegs rtsis pa'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs
380b2(mdo bskal bzang): pa tsan dan spos de la// tsam pa ka'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nyi ma ltar gshegs mar 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsal ba de la ni/ 
380b3(mdo bskal bzang): mar khu btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bde gshegs dag pa'i 'od ni dge slong tshe/ bde gshegs mngon 'phags stegs te 'chag sa dag/ chag chag phyag
380b4(mdo bskal bzang): dar byas te stan bting nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhugs tshong dpon tshe// de bzhi na gshegs pa blta na sdug de la/ snang sgron dag ni dbul
380b5(mdo bskal bzang): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems pa skyed// bde gshegs yon tan gtsug nas mchod pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs ba dpag med blo de la/ tsan dan dang ni 'bras bu phul nas
380b6(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dpal rdzogs gtso klag mkhan gyi tshe// bde gshegs nyi ma bstod ldan gzi brjid la// sos ka'i tsha ba'i dusun skyo ma phul// dang byang chub tu na
380b7(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng po stabs rgyal po'i bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bor de la ni/ chos kyi gdan dag bting ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
380b8(mdo bskal bzang): 'od gshegs gyen du 'phags pa shing bsrung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar grags de la/ yungs kar spor ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde ga bye
381a1(mdo bskal bzang): me tog byin ni shing bsrungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogasu rnam grags la// oMn ran da'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs
381a2(mdo bskal bzang): po 'od byen rkyong pa'i tshe// dri bzhin bu sheg slong \u0f7fsbyor rgyal po la// mu tig sbar bar bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// lhung bzed me tog gsar pas bkang ste
381a3(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni soms skye// gshegs dges pa tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer yangs pa la// bu ramo gong bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub
381a4(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskye do// ba~Md go shegs bgrod pa mau sa pa shing bsrungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa gsal de la// se'u g+han+te dag ni snyim pa bkang ste gtor// dang po byang chub
381a5(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyo'o// bde gA phyogs mu trig me gnas bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mchog de la ni// mig mi 'dzum pas lta ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do
381a6(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa rma mid lham mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i brtul zhugs lo// 'chil lham dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs
381a7(mdo bskal bzang): tog gi rgyal mtshan klong bu rdal gyi/ khye'u tshe de bde gshegs yid 'od gzigs de la/ me tog par sha'i phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bde bar dgongs
381a8(mdo bskal bzang): pas shing thun tshe/ bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni// ud pa la'i me tog dmar mo phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mu tig med rgyal 'khor bsgyur
381b1(mdo bskal bzang): tshe// de bzhin gshe gros pa dbyangs chen de la ni// na gza' rin po che dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mchog mkhyen pa blo ba'i tshe// 'ob su stegs dag gtsugs
381b2(mdo bskal bzang): pa byas nas kyang // byade gshegs 'od dpung gzi brjid chen po la// dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs dag pa'i rgya mtsho tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi 'od de la// khrus
381b3(mdo bskal bzang): khang dag ni byas te dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen mang ba rtsis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom mchod gnas la/ mtshal lham dag ni
381b4(mdo bskal bzang): dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mi mnga' ba ni shing bsrungs tshe// bde gshegs yon tan phung po gzi brjid la// rgun chad dag ni dbul
381b5(mdo bskal bzang): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs skye bo dga' mdzad dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gsal de la ni/ spos ni srang gi zhi cha dul nas kyang // dang po
381b6(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 'dre gshegs rma bya'i dri ro rtses pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro chen po la/ bskyed mos tshal dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni semam bskyed// bde ga tse/ 
381b7(mdo bskal bzang): ma zhum pa ni rngon pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom gsal ba de la ni// skyo ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs srid sred dri spangs shing
381b8(mdo bskal bzang): bsrungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa legs gan se la// shing sha pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs spyod pa'i stegs ni tshong pa'i tshe// 
382a1(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa stegs ni dbang po la// sran chung dang ni 'bras chan gzegs ma phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs lha mang snyan grags rim 'gro ba/ byed tshe bde
382a2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs ye shes 'byung gnas la// rdo'i gad na khri dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen stabs ni zhing pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rin chen la/ 
382a3(mdo bskal bzang): bro yi sbar ba bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs pad bsdams gtso klag mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po de'i/ na gza' dag ni bkru gshal
382a4(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ni khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pA/ stegs de la/ bzhugs gdan dbul ba byas nas kyang // 
382a5(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// byed gshegs dgra rgyal bram ze'i chung ma'i tshe// bde gshegs khro bcom byang chub snying por ni/ gshegs tshe sbrang rtsis sres pa'i 'o ma phul// dang po byang chub
382a6(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'byor ldan grags pa slong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sku de la// u dum 'bar ba'i 'bras bu dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sos
382a7(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed/ bde gshegs yul 'khor bzang po phreng rgyud bu ma'i rgyu// de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen grags pa'i 'di nga la// shing 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu'i dbul byas nas kyang // dang po
382a8(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// kha gshegs mo tog 'di ni phyogs rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro rnam dag la// lhung bzed dang bas bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
382b1(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs seng ge'i dra ro bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po bzhed de la// bstod pa dag gis dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdo gshegs zla ltar
382b2(mdo bskal bzang): shar ba tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rab zhi gsal ba la// dngul las byas pa'i lhung bzed phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'joms pa'i mchog ni
382b3(mdo bskal bzang): tshong dpon tshe// dri bzhin gshegs pa rtul ba'i gzi brjid la/ gnag lag khang ne tsan dan dmar pos byugs/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo zed rgyung
382b4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid legs mtsho la// me tog bla re dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs phan ldan bshegs pa tshong pa'i tshe// de
382b5(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa rmong pa'i 'od de la// dngul las byas pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// / bde gshegs bsod nams sgron ma rgyal po 'khor bsgyur ro// 
382b6(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs bya 'jig rten dag gi mchod rten de yi// gdugs chod lo grangs bdun b+har du sbyar nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dbyangs kyis bskul ba'i ding dpon
382b7(mdo bskal bzang): tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa dag de yi rta gtsug lag khring ni tsan dan dmar pos byis// dong po nying chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs ku ta ma nI lam ston no// de bzhin gshegs pa sta
382b8(mdo bskal bzang): bzangs gzi brjid la// gdugs dag ni sbyar te gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mdongs stobs bram ze'i khye'u yi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mchog de
383a1(mdo bskal bzang): la ni/ lam srang dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs blo gnas rang bzhin shing rta mkhan// byed tshe bde gshegs mthu brtsal chen po la
383a2(mdo bskal bzang): shing rta dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs zla ba zang po mi bkren tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i gzugs de la// mar me kha cig cig na
383a3(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub yan lag me tog gi/ shing tog 'tshong tshe bde gshegs shes rab mnga' ba la// aM 'bra'i 'bras bu gsum naM
383a4(mdo bskal bzang): dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bkra shis spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshe gas pa yon tan stegs de la// tsam pa ka'i me tog phul nas

383a6(mdo bskal bzang): byed r+ya las byas nas kyang / dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gzi brjid bstabs/ shing bsrungs tshe na bde gshegs zhi ba yi// blo gros de la se'u 'brum

383b4(mdo bskal bzang): pa spong ba'i shugs de la// khri yang khu'i bas da snyoms phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshul khrims 'od ni dbul po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa
