385b1(mdo bskal bzang): lam stan shing bol can dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho shing rta mkhan/ byed tshe bde gshegs brtul shugs chen po de yi// gnas khang
385b2(mdo bskal bzang): dag ni byug pas byugs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rmad byung snang ma'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa'i brten de la/ snang ba mar me dag ni bltam
385b3(mdo bskal bzang): shul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ngan spong rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa myos pa spong de la// me tog lnga ldi dag ni phul nas kyang // dang
385b4(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyeda'o// bde gshegs/ btud brlag mdzad pa dmag mi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshon gyi me tog la// mchil lham dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // 
385b5(mdo bskal bzang): drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdeg phye bag chags dag la stobs tshod pa'i tshe// bde gshegs pas gyisami khyab 'od de la// phreng ba dag las byas pa'i bla ro phul// dang po
385b6(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyeda'o// bode gshegs mi phyed blo mnga' shin pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'od de la/ shir sha'i phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
385b7(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa brgya mtsho drang po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de yi// spyan sngar glu blangs dag ni blangs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dag
385b8(mdo bskal bzang): mdzad grong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong zla ba la// gser gyi me tog dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshogs can grong rgyal tshong pa'i
386a1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs de la/ kha zar dag ni dbul ba nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gsheg dga' 'od pad ma mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs
386a2(mdo bskal bzang): ba blo gros mchog de la/ ka dan ka ta dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs byang chub rgyal mtshan mdun don tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la// chos la dag
386a3(mdo bskal bzang): ba'i na gza' phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs po ye shes rin chen phreng rgyud che/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snying po la/ me tog dag las byas pa'i rgyal mtsha
386a4(mdo bskal bzang): phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shin du bsil ba khyim bdag tshe// bu tshe de bzhin gshegs na pa yid gtong la/ nor bu rin chen mchil lham phul nas kyang
386a5(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshes rdzogs pa tshangs rgyal ded dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin byin pa la/ gser las byas pa'i gos dag phul nas kyang / 
386a6(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ye shes dgas pa shing rta mkhan/ byed tshe bde gshegs yid bzhin 'byor pa la// bzhugs khri'u dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byad/ 
386a7(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs rdzu 'phral tog ni gar mkhan tshe// bde gshegs thar pa dges de yi// spyan sngar bro gar dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// 
386a8(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs skye dbong mtshungs pa tshong dpon mi// bu tshe dad pas bde gshegs stabs mchog la/ gser skud dag gis gtor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde/ 
386b1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs so'i dbyung phyug rngon pa'i tshe// bde gshegs skye dbang mtshungs pa chang dpon cha// bu tsha dad pas brda gshegs skabs mchog la// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra dge 'dul ba la// 
386b2(mdo bskal bzang): las byas pa'i mchil khyam phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nyi ma dgyes pa phye mkhan tshe// byed tshe bde gshegs yul med spong ba la// ud pal zhal spos dge
386b3(mdo bskal bzang): ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems ni skyod// bde gshegs sgra go can zla ba gzhan bran tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'od de la// rtsa'i khang bzangs byas te phul nas kyang // dang po byung
386b4(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// 'di gya shegs mi tog 'od ni dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ngor mi sems pa la mchil snod dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sem skyed// 
386b5(mdo bskal bzang): bo de gshegs smin pa'i bdag pi bram ze'itshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag sgra bsgrogs la/ bye dUr+ya las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin
386b6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs byi zhal mngadus mnga' ba bzang mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med spyan de la/ na gza' dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bsod
386b7(mdo bskal bzang): nams dges pa bram ze'i cha/ de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs dpa' bo la// me tog zang mi shes pas gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' stobs/ 
386b8(mdo bskal bzang): rnga mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni// rnga bo rgya dag brdung ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde bar gshegs pa dbyings snyan phyug pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
387a1(mdo bskal bzang): pa dga' stobs rnga mkhan cha// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshogs de la// gling bu dag ni 'bud pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// debade gshegs pa chongs kyi
387a2(mdo bskal bzang): dbang phyug bram ze'i bur gyur tshe// bde gshegs yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs de la// sha ka dag las byas pa'i na gza' phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa
387a3(mdo bskal bzang): tshangs dbyangs zhing pa'i tshe// bsod nas 'dod phyir khron chu drung snod gzhag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa chen po la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs spyod bzang ba lang rdzi bo na
387a4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i lha de la// snod dga' zhes bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul blo ni gling bu mkhan byed tshe// 
387a5(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs/ sems spyod bdud rtsi la// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dag byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs pa khyim bdag tshe// gtsug lag
387a6(mdo bskal bzang): khang ni stong snyed byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bsal ba la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs snyan grags tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron
387a7(mdo bskal bzang): ma mchog de la/ phreng bar rgyas pa dag la gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa tog ldan shing thun tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros brtan pa la/ ud pa
387a8(mdo bskal bzang): gsum zhig gtor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi brjid rnam grangs tshong dpon gyi/ bu tshe bde gshegs mthu brtsal stobs de la// me tog dag gi phur/ 
387b1(mdo bskal bzang): ma phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'gro ba'i dpung phyug ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa pad 'dab spyan de la/ nor bu'i sgron ma dag la phul nas kyang / 
387b2(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ldan pa dbul po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub 'od de la// ma sha'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyedo// 
387b3(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs gti mug rab zad bya ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs mchog de la// sha srang gcig ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de gshegs dpag
387b4(mdo bskal bzang): med lha ris pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon shes drug sgra la// tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zla bzang
387b5(mdo bskal bzang): po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ma dngas stobs de le r+ya ni// gding ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chu tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mtha' yas 'od/ tshong
387b6(mdo bskal bzang): dpon bu tshe bde gshegs mi grangs la// mar me'i phreng ba mnga' de phul nas kyang / dong po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs brtul zhugs gtar ba tshong pa'i tshe// bde gshegs rgyal
387b7(mdo bskal bzang): ba'i me tog tshogs pa de'i/ sku la tsan dan dmar po dag gis byugs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs lha'i mchod gnas lha'i rim 'gro ba/ byed tshe de gzhan gshegs
387b8(mdo bskal bzang): ba gtsug chen la// me tog snying pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs mya ngan rgal ba smyig ma mkhan byed tshe// bde gshegs lha'i bdag po la// ta la mu tig
388a1(mdo bskal bzang): ngag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dge dges 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe// bde gshegs bag mi tsha bar gnas pa la// 'bru mar srang gcig cig
388a2(mdo bskal bzang): ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'gro ba'i blo gros 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe// bde gshegs dgra bcom byang chub la// yungs mar srang brgyad bsnyed ni phul nas
388a3(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dgas gshegs rgyal bu'i tshe// bde gshegs mya ngan med pa sel ba la// rma bya dag las byas pa'i bsil yab phul// dang po
388a4(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs mdzes ded dpon no// de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo rnam gnon la// mu tig dag ni gtor ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub
388a5(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ud dpal brgya byin tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de yi// sku tshe 'du byed bzung bar gsol btab nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyod// 
388a6(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs dul gnas me tog gser rtog mo// de bzhin gro shegs pa dpa' ba'i sems de la/ gser dag gis ni gtor ba byas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bde gshegs smos
388a7(mdo bskal bzang): bamama' las 'od zer bangam mkhan// byed ci de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa gas rab la/ shing las byas pa'i lung bzed dag ni byas nas kyang // rang gi byung chub tu ni sems bskyed// de
388a8(mdo bskal bzang): drang srong gsal ba breng rgyad tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yul min 'dor ba la// me tog dag las byas pa'i gtugs phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan brgyan
388b1(mdo bskal bzang): rdzas khyim bdag mo// de bzhin gshegs btsam pa'i ston ma la// 'jams gang zhig ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / rang po byung chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa snying po mar
388b2(mdo bskal bzang): tshe rje de bzhin gshegs pa mchod gnas dpal de la/ zhun mar srang brgyad bsnyed ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs lce bdag ka ran 'ja byed tshe// de bzhin
388b3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa blo gros legs sems la/ pa sha ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegaso rin chen 'thon po rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ga
388b4(mdo bskal bzang): brjid dpal de la// spos dang phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa gas la ba tshor ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo
388b5(mdo bskal bzang): dad pa la/ sbrang rtsi ldag par bya ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs paskal ldan shing tu mkhan/ lham mkhan chen bde gshegs blo mtshag
388b6(mdo bskal bzang): la/ mchil ldem dag ni dbul ba byas kyis kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bode gshegs bsod nams blo gros phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rab dgas gsal ba la// mngon
388b7(mdo bskal bzang): dag gi chun po yul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegaso sbyin bsreg 'od 'phro thabs mkhas tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid snang ba la/ ras kyi kha tshar da// 
388b8(mdo bskal bzang): ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bod gshegs yon tan gozi brjid phung po ni/ tshong pa byed tshe bde gshegs mi'i pad ma la/ ras yug zung du sbyar te phul nas kyang / 
389a1(mdo bskal bzang): dang pa byang chub tu ni sem skyed// bde gshegs seng ge'i stobs ni shing bsrungs che// de bzhin gshegs pa spos dri zhim pa la// se'u 'bru'i bcud khu dag ni bul nas kyang / dang
389a2(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo shing bsrungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i mchog de la/ ma ta mug ti'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
389a3(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyod// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs la// mar khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'od spyod khyim bdag bur gyur tshe/ 
389a4(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i dpal del// phreng bar rgyus pa dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed/ bde gshegs gru dbyangs shing rta mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhi
389a5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa nam mkha' mtshungs de la// gzims khri dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshe gas 'khor los 'dzin pa phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs
389a6(mdo bskal bzang): phra gsal ba'i lha de la/ me tog simA ma dag gis gsor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni semos bskyed// bde gshegs dbyig mchog ral pa can gyi tshe// bde gshegs bsam gyis mi
389a7(mdo bskal bzang): stengs de la// rtswa'i mal bstan dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bde gshegs 'jig rten dga' ba tshong dpon che// de bzhin gshegs bzla ba'i 'od de la/ phreng ba
389a8(mdo bskal bzang): dag ni dngul ba byas nas kyang / rang pa bying chub tu ni sems bskyed de/ bde gshegs chos kyi lag 'tshang tha ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po la// shing mchog dag ni bum na
389b1(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mtha' yas grags pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe// dpon po chen bde gshegs stobs can la// 'o ma dag gis dbul ba byas nas kyang / 
389b2(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin mdog gos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor ye shes la/ ras yug dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang

389b4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa smos bzangs dbul po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang blo de la// mar me'i snying po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs na mkha'i

389b6(mdo bskal bzang): pa'i tshe// phyag dar dag ni byas nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mchog de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdi gshegs lha rgyal phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
389b7(mdo bskal bzang): pa dpal gyi bshes gnyen la/ 'o ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nor bu gsal ni dka' thub can// byed tshe bde gshegs yid gnyis spo
389b8(mdo bskal bzang): ba po// de la gtugs dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bzangs spos 'tshong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoM ldan de la// ka ra~M sha ba

390a3(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs skyo dbang rgyal ba chang dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gnas de la// kun dga' ra ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu na

390a8(mdo bskal bzang): pa don mdzad phyug po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spos sred de la ni/ rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mdzad ma thag pa gzigs pa
390b1(mdo bskal bzang): khyim bdag che/ gtsug lag khang dag byas te phul nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa bsngos kyi glang po la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs srid pa'i me tog khrus pa'i tshe// 
390b2(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed blo la// khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs mdzod spur ldan pa drang srong tshe// de bzhin gshegs
390b3(mdo bskal bzang): pa blo gros mchog de la// ku shau dag las byas pa'i na gza' phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegaso baspobs pa mtshungs med rgyal po'i ri gro mkhan// byed tshe de bzhin ga
390b4(mdo bskal bzang): pa yon tan mkhan po la// de la me tog dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rnam 'byed nga ro 'gron po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
390b5(mdo bskal bzang): pa brtul zhugs seng ge de yi ni/ lam srang dag tugs dag gting po byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng ge'i mche ba dge slong tshe// de bzhin ga bye
390b6(mdo bskal bzang): rang ye shes blo gros la// lhung bzed chung ngu skyu ru ras bkang nas phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs mdzes par gshegs pa ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
390b7(mdo bskal bzang): yon tan lhun po la/ seng ge'i gdan khri dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bsod nams 'khor los bsgyur rgyal tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dar
390b8(mdo bskal bzang): sbyangs pa lo// rin po che las byas pa'i bla re phu la/ drang po byang chub tu ni semos bskyed/ bde gshegs chos smon gdugs ni tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba rnam 'byed la/ b+hu
391a1(mdo bskal bzang): babad rin pa ched gdum nas kyang / dang po byad chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bde gshegs byabazhis ldan btsod dpon no// de bzhin gshegs pags sa pa'i dpas de ma/ kun danas
391a2(mdo bskal bzang): rab dag na dus na byung/ dang po byung na d+hAn sim po ba da/ bde gshegs mya ngan med pa po// nong dpon bu tseldan ris dus nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa tha ba snang ba la/ dang byu
391a3(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshogs blo gros sems pa khyim bdag ni// gnas dang zas kyi rkyen ris bcad nas kyang / bde gshegs yon tan phung ba 'od de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sos
391a4(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa blo ldan 'ug pa'i tshe// gos dang shing leb dag ni gzhog nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems
391a5(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs chos sgron spyan ni dbul po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros ldan de la// rgyu sran brus pa dag ni dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde
391a6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs shugs 'don bu rim tshad mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grangs rgyal po la// bu ram shing gi bcud khu tung ba phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshig stobs
391a7(mdo bskal bzang): chen tshong pa'i chung ma'i tshe// bye khal gsum na gnyug mar gzhag nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs shes rab ma
391a8(mdo bskal bzang): tog ded dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi mchog ma de'i/ lam srang dag ni phyag ngar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs brtan pa'i dbyangs ni ded
391b1(mdo bskal bzang): dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'od de la/ gos kyi bla re dag ni phul nus kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ldan smad 'tshong tshe// de bzhin ga
391b2(mdo bskal bzang): pa bdud rtsi sems pa la/ sha'i phur ma ngag ni phul nas kyang // po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa don gsung tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can rab mcho
391b3(mdo bskal bzang): la// ka sha'i gdan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs dges gsal grong brdal tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs gtsug phud dges de la// kha
391b4(mdo bskal bzang): ngag dang sbyar ba'i btung ba phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng ge'i zhal ni phreng rgyud tshe// bde gshegs kha dog zil gyis mi non la/ me tog
391b5(mdo bskal bzang): khal bcu dag ni gtor nas kyang / dang po byang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phud shing srung che/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba la/ spos dang a
391b6(mdo bskal bzang): 'dra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad slong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal ba yi// bshos dang bdag
391b7(mdo bskal bzang): nyid bcangs te bsgyur nas kyang // rang pa byang chub d+ha ni sems bstod// sangs rgyas stong gis sngon gyi nul// / rdzob ste/ @// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
391b8(mdo bskal bzang): bcad pa 'di dag bka' bstsal to// de lhor sangs rgyas dag la byung ba yis/ yon phul rnam par smin pa 'di dag yin/ 'khor tshe de'i 'bras bu de 'dran/ mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems
393a1(mdo bskal bzang): gami bskyed/ nam mkha' dag ni tshang dag bzung ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po mthar gyis bgrang nus kyang // sangs rgyas dag la dad pa shas tsam gyis/ bsod nams chad bzung ba ni nus
393a2(mdo bskal bzang): pa dka'// ji srid mya ngan 'das bde ma reg par/ de srid mi khom stugasngal myong mi 'gyur// de bas rgyal ba bsod nams zhing thob nas/ bag yod mi yis bkur bsti mchod pa gyis// 
393a3(mdo bskal bzang): sangs rgyas dag la ldog par mos pa yis// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung la// mchod pa bcu shes byed pa'i yon tan mtha'// bsam par nus pa yin na da ltar zhog/ byang chub
393a4(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed rgyal ba yon phul dang // gang dag tshad med chos 'di bzhi po dang // na mkha'i khams dang sems can khams kun dag/ ston pa ma gtogs shes rab nus
393a5(mdo bskal bzang): pa med// grong phyir sems can thams cad rje su phyir// byang chub sems bskyed gnas pa ji lta bar/ dbul pos dpag tshad khor yug gcig tsam gyis// gter bdag rnyed pa de ltar
393a6(mdo bskal bzang): dga' ma yino// sangs rgyas byang chub phyir ni rgyal ba yin// rnam par rol pa brgyad dang stobs bcu dang // sems can bsdud pa lnga brgya dga' mdzad ga ni// rtogs byed 'jug pa dang rna
393a7(mdo bskal bzang): brgyad khri dang // rtogs par byed pa brgya bcu rtsa bzhi dang // bla na med pa'i sgo mo drug khri dang / sa rnams 'byed dang ye shes bdun bcuna'o// sangs rgyas mtshon pa spyod pa bcwo brgyad dang / 
393a8(mdo bskal bzang): gnon pa lnga dang bstan pa bcu// skyong yul zer 'bum phrag ni bcug cig dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas dag gi yon tan dang / mtshon dang dpe byad dag gi sbyong mi ma dge/ 'ang sangs rgyas kyi rgyun
393b1(mdo bskal bzang): yul lam min la// nyan thos sgra rjes 'grang ba smos ci dgos// mtshungs pa med pa 'dra ba yong min pas// des na sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab ces brjod// gang dag byang chub mchog reg bsam
393b2(mdo bskal bzang): yod pas// de dang de dag mi dag mtshungs med spyod/ de dag de ring 'jig rten nor chen rnyed// de dag 'jig rten legs par 'tsho bas 'tsho// bdud rnams bcom ste bdud rtsi rig byas nas// chur
393b3(mdo bskal bzang): sprin lhun sdug lta bur tshim par byed// gang de byang chub la zhugs 'jig rten skyob// de dag nor bdun bdag gi bsdu bar byed// gal te sdug sngal brgya mang bzod byed pa// nges pa byang chub gang zhugs
393b4(mdo bskal bzang): skyo mi 'gyur// de yis mchod rten de dag myur thob la// 'jig rten kun gyi mchog ma dag tu 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyu yis sdugasngal mang po myong bar 'gyur// gang gis rnam par smin
393b5(mdo bskal bzang): pos ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur// mtho ris 'gro dang byang chub yon tan don gyi phyir// mkhas pa su zhig byis pa dag dang 'gal bar byed// byis pa 'gal byed mkhas pa 'gal mi
393b6(mdo bskal bzang): byed// mi shes 'khrul yin shes ldan dran pa thob// blun po 'dam byin mkhas pa thang la gnas// gang dag chos spyod pa ni de la bzod// de bas rigs pa can min spang bya zhing // gang dag shes yul
393b7(mdo bskal bzang): rigs ldan bsten par bya/ dpal dang grags pa rnyed pa spangs nas// ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni rnal 'byor sangs rgyas re re'i yon tan dran par yang / bskal pa khri khrog tshad kyang bzod byed na// sas
393b8(mdo bskal bzang): rgyas yon tan bsam med smos ci dgos// de bas sdugasngal nyams dag dang du long // bzod dang ting 'dzin dag gi gos bgos la// brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan tshul khrims shing rta bzhon// sbyin
394a1(mdo bskal bzang): thobs shes rab ma 'a mas bdud bcom to// zas byas byang chub dag la reg par bye// byams pa'i grags dang bsgrub pa'i bzhes gnyen dang / byur med par pa byin pa du byed pa/ 
394a2(mdo bskal bzang): brjod nas sas zhugs kyis nas bzhin/ kha' par gyus/ mchog tu dga' ba ma ba sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus ni/ thams cad dmakhyen pa ma mi shes thab par gyis/ debs
394a3(mdo bskal bzang): skad 'dir gsungs rnam nges la// bag dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyor ba bgyis/ mkha' la ngang pa'i skad 'byin dga' ba ltar// thams cad mkhyen pa myur du thob par gyis// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal ba
394a4(mdo bskal bzang): sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// de bzhin gshegs po brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba/ 'khor ther 'bum snyed dang ba cas pa zhig byung bar gyur te// ting nge 'dzin 'di ston to// 
394a5(mdo bskal bzang): ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa na/ de'i tshe rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba zhig 'byung bar thos nas/ des btsun mo stong dang / sras srong la smras pa/ ting 'dzin zab par snang dran
394a6(mdo bskal bzang): don kyang mi shes/ ma shes pas rtogs par bya bar mi nus// de ltar yin gyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa la/ bdag cag gis rje su yi rang ba ni bgyi'o// bcom ldan
394a7(mdo bskal bzang): 'das kyis legs par gsungs shing // bshad pa'i ting 'dzin 'di la rje su yi rang bar byas pas// de dag rje su yi rang ba'i mdo las// bskal pa brgyad khrir 'khor bar bsnyil ba nas// de las/ 
394a8(mdo bskal bzang): kha phyir phyogs par gyur to// khyim can zhes bya ba gzungs kyang thob par gyur to// byang chub ji skad bstan pa la yang the tsom med par gyur to// dge ba'i rtsa ba des na sangs rgyas sum 'bum dag mnyes
394b1(mdo bskal bzang): par byas par gyur to// thams cad du yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur te/ log par ltung ba dang mi khom bla dag tu nam yang ltung bar ma gyur to// rgyu de kho nas byang chub mngon par rdzog
394b2(mdo bskal bzang): par sangs rgyas par gyur to// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgyu bar 'gyur/ mchog tu dge'i rgyal ba khyod de'i mi de'i dus na/ rgyal po bsod nams mjug cis bya ba khyod kyis gzhan yin na snyam
394b3(mdo bskal bzang): de ltar lta bar mi bya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na// rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya bar gyur to// bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i
394b4(mdo bskal bzang): de'i dus na/ srang stong du gyur to// de ltar rje su/ yid rang ba tsam gyis kyang // tinge 'dzin 'di mthu che ba yin na// klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mtshan
394b5(mdo bskal bzang): tu dga' ba'i rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba 'khor 'bum snyed dang bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur te// de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'o/ 
394b6(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal po blo yangs shes bya bas// khang bzangs gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dmar po'i chus btab pa/ a ga nu'i bdug pas bdugs pa zhig bu'o// long spyod pa'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun
394b7(mdo bskal bzang): la yang de kho na dang 'dra bar zhig phul bar gyur to// de dag thams cad la yang bskyed mos tshul re re yang phul bar gyur to// des bcom ldan 'das 'di las ting 'dzin bstan pa 'di yang thos so// de nas
394b8(mdo bskal bzang): bcom ldan 'das kyis rim 'gro ba mang du thos pa rjes kyi mchog/ shes rab rdzogs shes bya bar gyur to// ngas 'di skad du 'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di shes par bya na/ khyim na gnas pas
395a1(mdo bskal bzang): ni 'di gtogs par dka'i/ de nas kyang bdag gi sgra dang kha spu dregs la/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya/ gor mchag go zhes smras/ de nas des skra dang kha spu dregs
395a2(mdo bskal bzang): nas gas ngur smrig pags to// khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ sgras khri dang btsun mo brgyad stong de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rab tu byung ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam pa dag zhus pa
395a3(mdo bskal bzang): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa thug su chud kyang / ting 'dzin 'di zhag bdun bdun gyi bar du rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// de dag gos thos kyang gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kyis
395a4(mdo bskal bzang): ting nge 'dzin thob pa dka' mod kyi/ 'on kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di legs par bris te/ bcang bar bya'o// zhes 'dzer to// de ngag thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di bris nas kyang mchod par
395a5(mdo bskal bzang): bya'o// bzung ngo // lung yang 'bog go// de nas de dag thams cad dus las 'das nas/ slar de dag tshogs par gyur pas/ sangs rgyas drug 'bum mnyes par byas par gyur to// tha cang
395a6(mdo bskal bzang): du ni ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par gyur to// thams cad du rab tu byung nas/ ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to// smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas/ thams cad kyis byang chub
395a7(mdo bskal bzang): rab tu thob par gyur to// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po b+h+yo yangs de khyod kyis gzhan yin no// snyam par de ltar blta bar bya ste/ de bzhin pargya
395a8(mdo bskal bzang): pa mar me mdzad de// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de ni dge slong rim gro ba zhes rab rdzogs zhes bya
395b1(mdo bskal bzang): bar gyur to// gang dag sras khri bo de dag ni bskal pa 'di nas gzung ste/ bskal pa drug bcu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyuraro// de'i 'og bskal pa grangs med pa chen po zhes bya ba zhig
395b2(mdo bskal bzang): byung bar gyur to// bskal pa gcig po de la de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gang dag blon po brgyad khri bo de dag ni/ bskal pa grangs med pa chen po 'das nas/ 
395b3(mdo bskal bzang): bskal pa brgyad bcu'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la blon po brgyad khri bzhi po dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs
395b4(mdo bskal bzang): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa skar ma lta bu 'das nas/ bskal pa sum brgyan sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyu ro// de'i 'og tu bskal pa sum brgya pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byed
395b5(mdo bskal bzang): bar 'gyur te/ de la btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin 'di ni
395b6(mdo bskal bzang): de ltar 'bras bu che ba yin no// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta bar gyur pas/ ting nge 'dzin 'di tsa
395b7(mdo bskal bzang): bar bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tsheng rgya bar 'dod pas/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe// tshigasu bcad pa 'di ga
395b8(mdo bskal bzang): bka' bstsal to// sangs rgyas byang chub don du gnyer ba gang / de dag rgyal po de'i rje su slong / yang dag bsgrub la gnas pa ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis byang chub mchog ma thob mi 'gyur/ 
396a1(mdo bskal bzang): daltar 'dir ni dang pa chung bskyed kyang // de bzhin rnam smin gyi na ma thong bar 'gyur// de bas g.yog med lhag pa'i bsam pa yis// 'dir na tshe rigs bkur bstis nal 'gyur
396a2(mdo bskal bzang): g+has/ rgyal ba gang de bdag gis 'dir po skyugs pa// de dag gang zhig mthong bar 'dod pa dang // bstan pa rgya cher bshad par 'dod pa dag/ ji skad bstan bzhin 'di la rnam 'byar gyis/ 
396a3(mdo bskal bzang): sa rang nyid kyis phun sun tshogs 'gyur na/ 'chang dang gros pa lta zhig ci smos te/ yon tan mtha' ni 'gro bas bsam me 'ag// 'di thos su zhig rnal 'byor sbyor mi byed// byang chub so so yang
396a4(mdo bskal bzang): ngag rig mtshan dang // ston du pha rol sems nigleng ba dang // bsgrub dang snang ba gang dag sangs rgyas chos// ting nge 'dzin 'di las ni btsal bar bya// las basbyor de bzhin
396a5(mdo bskal bzang): bdud rnams 'joms pa dang / lta sbyong de bzhin srid pa zang byed dang // rnam par gnon dang zhing bkod 'byor pa dag/ 'di dag rab tu ldan la mgon ma yin/ de bzhin rnam grol
396a6(mdo bskal bzang): spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // bya ba thams cad sbyong byed gzungs dag dang // bsam pa ji bzhin byang chub 'tshang rgya ba/ de dag thams cad 'dir gnas mod pa yin// nga yis de snyed tshig
396a7(mdo bskal bzang): gis brjod nus rnams// de lta bas na de dag 'dir bsgrubs shig/ kun mkhyen chos la dga' bar ma byas na// phyi dus dag na 'gyod pa gyur ta re/ pha rol phyin pa ji snyed ngas bstan dang // 
396a8(mdo bskal bzang): gang dag ye shes rgya mtsho sbyor lam dang // lus brten byis pa'i spyod pas gnas pa yis// shes par bya ba dag tu nus ma yin// dus ngan pa dang sems can ma rungs dang // chos nub mtha/ 
396b1(mdo bskal bzang): dang ngan song 'phel ba dang / mkhas pas shin du yang 'byung byas pa dang / bag yod ri dgas bzhin du skrag par 'gyur// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis/ 
396b2(mdo bskal bzang): bskal pa stong du thabs mkhas ma gtogs par// pha rol du phyin pa drug dag la dbyang ba bas ni// ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas/ rje su mi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des/ brgya'i char ya
396b3(mdo bskal bzang): nye bar mi 'gro bas/ dpe'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro yo/ chos kyi nam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
396b4(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed de/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las/ phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i tshogs brgyad 'bum snyed dang
396b5(mdo bskal bzang): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// lha de dag chos kyi mig rnam par dag pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir/ 'jig
396b6(mdo bskal bzang): rten gyi khams stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag/ me tog gi chal par bkram par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// 
396b7(mdo bskal bzang): bar snang las kyang lha'i rnga sgra dag bsgrags so// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba snyed thams cad kyis kyang / ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo// bcom
396b8(mdo bskal bzang): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
